action.name: Ich hatte gedacht, Sie wären größer

crew_archetypes.name: Reed (Sektion 31)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Malcolm Reed wurde gezwungen, für Sektion 31 zu arbeiten, und untersuchte ein klingonisches Projekt.

crew_archetypes.name: Reed (Tourist)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Malcolm Reed suchte nur eine Begleitung für seinen Aufenthalt auf dem Vergnügungsplaneten Risa und brachte sich in eine verzweifelte Lage.

action.name: Folge zwei Außerirdischen in den Keller

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: After Mayweather injures his leg while exploring Archer’s Comet, Reed helps him to escape.

crew_archetypes.name: Twilight Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

crew_archetypes.name: Birthday Cake Reed
crew_archetypes.flavor: A secret mission undertaken by a crewmate and friend brings a smile to the mysterious Malcom’s face.

action.name: Es geht vorüber. Wirklich. Es geht vorüber.

crew_archetypes.name: Miranda Jones
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dr. Miranda Jones verbrachte viele Jahre ihres Studiums auf Vulkan und erlangte dadurch Kontrolle über ihre telepathischen Fähigkeiten. Da sie blind geboren wurde, ist sie immun gegen die Meduser und kann so einen ihrer Botschafter an Bord der Enterprise begleiten.

action.name: Gewalttätige Emotionen sind ein Zeichen des Wahnsinns

crew_archetypes.name: D'Erika Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: D'Erika stages her own kidnapping on the eve of her wedding with one goal - to return her sister D'Vana to the Syndicate.

action.name: Wow, Did Starfleet Teach You Those Amazing Detective Skills?

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Leto
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leto is Booker and Burnham's son. He's about to take command of his own starship, and he needs his parents' support more than ever.

action.name: I Want Them To Be Inspired, You Know?

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Shaxs is ready and willing to solve any issue with direct confrontation. Let’s consider ourselves lucky he is on our side.

crew_archetypes.name: Heroic Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: When the entire crew was in danger from the Pakled onslaught, Shaxs sacrificed himself to save the others.

crew_archetypes.name: Bankrobber Shaxs
crew_archetypes.flavor: Shaxs and T'Ana  roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Everybody Down! This Is A Robbery!

crew_archetypes.name: Possessed Felisa Howard
crew_archetypes.flavor: During her lifetime, Felisa had a lover, Ronin, who was an anaphasic creature and who possessed her exhumed corpse.

crew_archetypes.name: Geotechniker Fisher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Geologe und leitender Wissenschaftsoffizier, der sowohl unter Pike, als auch unter Kirk auf der Enterprise diente.

crew_archetypes.name: Brunt, F.C.A.
crew_archetypes.flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

action.name: Auf eine schnelle Runde mit ihr

crew_archetypes.name: Senatorin Cretak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Cretak ist eine romulanische Senatorin und Repräsentantin auf Deep Space 9, die Opfer der Ränkeschmiede von Sektion 31 wurde.

crew_archetypes.name: Palor Toff
crew_archetypes.flavor: Merchant and collector of rare items. He is so passionate about it that he agreed to get on board to evaluate a unique specimen - Commander Data.

crew_archetypes.name: Pirate Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi is cast as the savage warrior queen who comes from a long line of Orion Pirates, in the Holonovel “Crisis Point” created by Mariner.

crew_archetypes.name: Tendi and The Dog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi's hand-edited, genetically sequenced Dog may not be quite like Earth dogs, but she's still a good girl with some freakish powers.

action.name: Who Has Malleable Protein Bonds? You Do!

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi left her pirate days behind to join Starfleet. She brings relentless enthusiasm and friendship to the entire team.

action.name: Did That Full Molecular Engorgement Feel Amazing?!

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Medical Officer Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Battling her conscience while serving as CMO in a drill, Tendi might be more dangerous for her Klingon patient than anything he had planned.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi is helping repair a satellite when a nebula catches her eye. Unfortunately, it’s at that moment the Cerritos beams away to answer a distress call.

action.name: Wow, Would You Look At That?

crew_archetypes.name: Mistress of the Winter Constellations
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prior to joining Starfleet, Tendi was a member of the Orion Syndicate, where she seems to have developed a fearsome reputation.

action.name: Shut Up And Do Your Job!

crew_archetypes.name: Scorpion Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: An enraged Tendi picks up a strange pink cube that turns her into a huge scorpion.

crew_archetypes.name: Haliian Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Who would have thought that the enthusiastic Haliian woman interested in the collection would be the disguised Orion pirate D’Vana Tendi?

action.name: That's The Most Interesting Thing You've Said All Day!

crew_archetypes.name: Dilmerian Tendi
crew_archetypes.flavor: In addition to researching Dilmer, Tendi spent much of her time restoring Data's recovered head.

action.name: Ah, Another Fruitful Day Of Scanning Indigenous Plants
Leben schenken, Leben nehmen, immer dasselbe

crew_archetypes.name: Fungoide
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoch entwickelte, geheimnisvolle Spezies mit unbekannten Zielen, die lautlos Jagd auf die Enterprise machte und sie angriff.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Mendon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mendon war ein Benzite und mit dafür verantwortlich, dass eine subatomare Bakterieninfektion der Enterprise gestoppt wurde.

crew_archetypes.name: Molly O'Brien (deplatziert)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Molly wurde aus einem temporalen Portal gerettet und zurück an Bord von Deep Space Nine gebracht, nachdem für sie auf dem verlassenen Planeten zehn Jahre vergangen waren.

crew_archetypes.name: Ariana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ariana was a literal dream come true for Wyatt Miller, who had visions and dreams of her since childhood.

action.name: And I Knew You Would Be This Brave

crew_archetypes.name: Krax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Krax is aghast; his father made Quark Nagus, then 'died.' When Krax tried to kill Quark, it turned out his father faked his death as a test.

action.name: Father, Have You Lost Your Mind?

crew_archetypes.name: Phased Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler was helping Rutherford with a transporter experiment and ended up phased after an accident.

crew_archetypes.name: USS Titan Bradward Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler joins the crew of the USS Titan, where he is promoted to lieutenant junior grade.

action.name: I Don’t Have To Write That Down

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bradward Boimler is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. He is desperate to prove himself a competent and valuable member of the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Cowpoke Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Brad Boimler is the rootin'est tootin'est cowpoke around. If he wants to be sheriff someday, he'll have to get used to the itchy chaps.

action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

crew_archetypes.name: Fanboy Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Get your “Voy” Collector’s Plate ready ‘cause Captain Proton and the creator of Fair Haven, Lt. Tom Paris, will be visiting the Cerritos!

action.name: Fine, You Want to Play It That Way?

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler is on a satellite repair mission making himself useful and enjoying the view while he still has the opportunity.

crew_archetypes.name: Borg Baby Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wanting to get the maximum score for the drill, Boimler passed it over and over again, each time saving more and more Borg babies.

crew_archetypes.name: Excretus of Borg
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boimler finds himself completely assimilated by the Borg during a holoprogram drill. And all he wanted was just to get a perfect score.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: During Mariner’s drill, Terran Boimler exposed her when she greeted him with her left hand.

action.name: Did You Just Salute Me With Your Left Hand?

crew_archetypes.name: Vineyard Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: While on temporary leave, Boimler went to his family's vineyard, where Mariner finds him to propose another adventure.

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Once on the Enterprise, Boimler was incredibly excited about meeting his idols, though keeping his future knowledge under wraps proved to be a challenge.

crew_archetypes.name: Bold Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: One step away from defeat, Boimler gains a surge of courage and finds a way to get to the terminal before delta shift.

crew_archetypes.name: Michael Jonas
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Maquis crew member who betrayed the combined crew of the Voyager to Seska and the Kazon.

action.name: She Knows That I Can Be Trusted

crew_archetypes.name: Rayna Kapec
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rayna's feelings were supposed to be the final step in her development, according to her creator. But they are exactly what destroyed the android.

action.name: I Was Not Human. Now I Love. I Love.

crew_archetypes.name: Tekeny Ghemor
crew_archetypes.flavor: A legate in the Cardassian Central Command. Ghemor is secretly involved in the Cardassian Dissident movement and is willing to risk his cover to protect Kira.

action.name: I Won't Let Them Hurt You

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Carol Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariner’s shenanigans.

crew_archetypes.name: Minooki Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Any hopes for a normal day on the Cerritos are dashed when Captain Freeman is possessed by the mask of Minooki.

crew_archetypes.name: Command Conference Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Freeman didn't make it to the Starfleet party, but she did have a great time with those she cares about. Well, she took a little revenge for the first party.

crew_archetypes.name: Cosmo Traitt
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Cleveland Booker seine Fracht gestohlen hat, sucht Traitt unermüdlich nach ihm, um seinen Auftrag zu beenden.

crew_archetypes.name: Appropriate Attire Nevesa
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Romulan commander sees winning Spock’s heart as a way to win power and influence in the Empire - by using him to help her capture the Enterprise.

action.name: Then There Is A Truth Here That Remains Unspoken

crew_archetypes.name: Grubdin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Grubdin's helmet isn't big enough to call a truce, but it's big enough to frame Freeman and Shaxs for Rumdar’s kidnapping.

action.name: I Do Not Have A Big Enough Helmet To Make Ceasefires

crew_archetypes.name: Bhavani
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bhavani led a conference to sell the previously discovered wormhole, confident it would be beneficial for her people.

action.name: It Will Also Produce A New Era Of Prosperity For My People

crew_archetypes.name: Compromised Kamran Gant
crew_archetypes.flavor: After Gant was reanimated by Control, he lured Michael Burnham to ‘reconstruct’ her.

action.name: To Achieve One Requires The Other

crew_archetypes.name: Schneider Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak besteht darauf, ein einfacher Schneider zu sein, aber einige an Bord von DS9 denken, dass er sehr viel mehr ist.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als ranghöchster Cardassianer an Bord der Raumstation Terok Nor bevorzugt Garak brutale Disziplin, um die Ordnung aufrecht zu erhalten.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak (Obsidianischer Orden)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Garak wieder mit seinem Mentor Enabran Tain vereint ist, erhält er den Auftrag, einen gefangenen Wechselbalg zu verhören: Odo.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak, Elim Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak ist neugierig, was Bashir auf dem Holodeck so anstellt und verschafft sich Zutritt zu dessen Geheimagenten-Holoprogramm.

action.name: Es gibt doch noch Hoffnung für dich
Sie haben vermutlich den gesamten Alpha-Quadranten gerettet.

crew_archetypes.name: Garak (Raumanzug)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak wurde von Sisko bestochen, um gemeinsam mit O'Brien an der Mission auf der verminten cardassianischen Station Empok Nor teilzunehmen.

crew_archetypes.name: Hologram Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Garak doesn't mind listening to Quark's chatter, but only in the form of a simulation in the holodeck.

crew_archetypes.name: CMO Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an alternate universe, surgeon Garak has a lot to do: treat Harry Kims and argue with Bashir about whose reality they will live in.

action.name: I Don't Care Where We End Up As Long As We're Together

crew_archetypes.name: Uncertain Times Garak
crew_archetypes.flavor: At the end of the Dominion War, Garak was left alone - no father, no mother, and, it seems, no best friend.

crew_archetypes.name: Philippa Georgiou (Bewaffnet)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain Georgiou grub einen Brunnen der Crepusculan aus und rettete die Spezies so vor dem Verdursten.

action.name: Ich dachte, wir hätten eine Abmachung
Sie haben ganz schön viel Aufregung verursacht

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Georgiou
crew_archetypes.flavor: Georgiou tarnt sich an Bord der Discovery während einer Untersuchung der Vereinigten Erdverteidigungsstreitkräfte als Admiral.

crew_archetypes.name: Cabaret Georgiou
crew_archetypes.flavor: Georgiou’s actions during the operation on Qo’noS earn her an invitation into Section 31 while she is laying low in an Orion cabaret.

action.name: I’ll Ask Again--What Do You Want?

crew_archetypes.name: Laneth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Laneth, bei der eine genetische Verbesserung gescheitert ist, kämpft darum, ihr klingonisches Herz zu behalten.

crew_archetypes.name: Ascended O'Connor
crew_archetypes.flavor: O'Connor himself no longer believed that he would succeed in ascending and confessed this to Tendi when the ascension finally occurred.

action.name: I'm Gonna Do It! I'm Gonna Ascend!

crew_archetypes.name: All-in Owosekun
crew_archetypes.flavor: Owosekun was picked for this mission because of her raw determination to act, which she shows again in the fighting ring with a knockout.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Owosekun
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the mirror universe, Owosekun led the Philippa Georgiou’s Honor Guard and later became the Chief of Security.

crew_archetypes.name: Drea
crew_archetypes.flavor: Drea was a member of the Kelvan Empire's exploration team, and narrowly escaped when the expedition ship was destroyed.

crew_archetypes.name: Gotana-Retz
crew_archetypes.flavor: An astronaut from the planet Kelemane, where there was a major time shift. During the Orbital 1 mission, he managed to survive the time shift and help Voyager enter orbit.

action.name: Ich bin hier nicht der Idiot!

crew_archetypes.name: Larkin (Unterwäsche)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Larkin verlässt in Unterwäsche sein Quartier und erlebt die Konsequenzen seiner nicht autorisierten Experimente mit den Tribbles.

crew_archetypes.name: Kara
crew_archetypes.flavor: To save her people, Kara decided to steal Spock's brain to power the Great Teacher.

action.name: I Will Not Betray My People

crew_archetypes.name: Gamal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gamal, a Majalan elder and doctor, was willing to risk it all to save his son from a horrific sacrificial fate.

action.name: Lift Us Where Suffering Cannot Reach

crew_archetypes.name: George und Gracie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem sie 1986 von Kirk und seiner Crew vor Walfängern gerettet wurden, retteten diese heldenhaften Meeresbewohner die Welt des 23. Jahrhunderts, indem sie mit einer Sonde per Walgesang kommunizierten.

action.name: Armselig der Schüler, der seinen Meister nicht übertrifft

crew_archetypes.name: Dritter Remata'Klan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein dritter Jem'Hadar. Er folgte Keevans Befehle treu bis zu seinem Tod.

crew_archetypes.name: Ki Mendrossen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sarek's chief of staff. Together with Perrin, he hid Sarek's illness as long as he could, so that the Legaran conference could still take place.

action.name: I Can Not Delay The Conference

crew_archetypes.name: Gideon Seyetik
crew_archetypes.flavor: A renaissance man, Gideon ultimately sacrificed himself to save his wife.

crew_archetypes.name: K'Ehleyr (Klingonin)
crew_archetypes.flavor: K'Ehleyr soll einige Klingonen wieder in die aktuelle Zeitlinie integrieren und enthüllt dabei Worf ihre wahren Gefühle für ihn.

crew_archetypes.name: Toreth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Toreth’s long-standing distrust of the Tal Shiar raises the stakes on an intense mission to smuggle defectors to the Federation without her knowledge.

crew_archetypes.name: Leila Kalomi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Leila verliebte sich in Spock und war froh, als bewusstseinsverändernde Sporen ihn dasselbe empfinden ließen. Es war nicht von Dauer.

crew_archetypes.name: Vash (auf Expedition)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine Studentin der Archäologie, die für ihre ethisch fragwürdigen Praktiken bekannt ist.

action.name: Ich kann nicht ändern, wer ich bin
Ich entscheide mich immer für den Profit

crew_archetypes.name: Profitjäger Vash
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vash versucht, schnellen Profit zu machen, indem er sich mit Quark zusammentut, um eine Auktion an Bord von Deep Space Nine abzuhalten.

crew_archetypes.name: Holiday Vash
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vash met Picard on Risa and fell in love with him. However, this did not stop her from using him for her own purposes.

action.name: You Look Like a Man Who Could Handle Trouble

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker war Chefingenieur an Bord der NX-01 Enterprise und hat sich nie davor gefürchtet, sich die Hände schmutzig zu machen.

crew_archetypes.name: Tucker (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Chefingenieur der ISS Enterprise konnte Tucker die Sabotage der USS Defiant abwenden.

crew_archetypes.name: Tucker (Geskana)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem sie einem gestrandeten Schiff geholfen haben, testen Archer und Trip ihren Mut in einer außerirdischen Sportart.

crew_archetypes.name: Mutinous Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker confronts Archer when he, infected with an insectoid, begins to make strange and sometimes dangerous decisions for the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Pregnant Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker was faced with the fact that if you play a ‘game’ on an alien ship, you can not only have fun, but also get pregnant.

crew_archetypes.name: Desert Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lured to an alien world and pulled into a power struggle, Tucker and Archer are forced to wander under the scorching sun, awaiting rescue.

action.name: It's Hotter Than Hell Out There

crew_archetypes.name: Dawn Trip Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker's shuttle tests end in disaster - he is attacked by a hostile alien, forcing him to land on a desert planet.

action.name: What The Hell Are You Doing? Are You Crazy?

crew_archetypes.name: Pick-up Game Tucker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tucker indulges in a pick-up game of basketball with his crewmates, showing himself to be a gracious winner as always.

action.name: That's Another Game. Twenty One To Two.

crew_archetypes.name: Holo-Techniker Zimmerman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dr. Lewis Zimmerman besucht Deep Space Nine, um Bashir als Vorlage für sein neues medizinisches Langzeit-Hologramm zu verwenden.

action.name: Ich bin hier, um dich unsterblich zu machen

crew_archetypes.name: Norah Satie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Retired Admiral Norah Satie arrives on the Enterprise to ‘unravel a conspiracy’.

action.name: I Have No Friends. But I Have A Purpose.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kang
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kang und Kirk müssen zusammenarbeiten, um ihren nicht-körperlichen Gegner gemeinsam zu bekämpfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Counselor Neera Ketoul
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neera serves as Una’s lawyer in her court martial. Skeptical of Starfleet, she works to show the injustice done to Una - and all Illyrians.

action.name: I Am Not The Biggest Fan of Starfleet

crew_archetypes.name: Acting Chief Engineer Joe Carey
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the tragic events in the Delta Quadrant, Carey became the Chief Engineer, a position he was reluctant to give up.

action.name: I'm The Senior Officer And I Speak For Engineering

crew_archetypes.name: Infected Tryla Scott
crew_archetypes.flavor: Parasitic beings have infiltrated Starfleet. While Captain Scott is amongst the first to suspect something is wrong, she unfortunately becomes infected by the parasite in the end.

crew_archetypes.name: Leosa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dabo girl Leosa tricked Barclay into revealing details of the Pathfinder Project and sold the information to her Ferengi boss, Nunk.

crew_archetypes.name: Chuft-Captain
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chuft-Captain kommandierte die Truppen der Kzinti an Bord der Traitors Klaue, um Relikte der Slaver-Stasisboxen zu ergattern.

action.name: Ihr seid das Fleisch auf unseren Tischen

crew_archetypes.name: Doktor Culber (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein hochrangiger Arzt des Terranischen Imperiums, der Lorca und Burnham bei der Thronübernahme unterstützt.

crew_archetypes.name: Culber (bajoranisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein fehlerhaftes Holoprogramm an Bord des Wracks der KSF Khi'eth lies Culber als Bajoraner erscheinen.

crew_archetypes.name: Culber (Vertrauensperson)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chefarzt und Fels in der Brandung für die Crew der Discovery, der die wissenschaftliche Forschung nicht aufgibt, um Gray zu helfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Jinaal Culber
crew_archetypes.flavor: Culber allows the symbiont to enter his body to get the next clue from Jinaal.

action.name: Wow, This Guy Really Works Out!

crew_archetypes.name: Korrd
crew_archetypes.flavor: Korrd lost his former glory and edge as a talented strategist and diplomat, but was still able to help Spock and Kirk.

action.name: Die Oberste Direktive trifft hier nicht zu!

crew_archetypes.name: Lord Burleigh
crew_archetypes.flavor: This brooding, enigmatic widower stars in Janeway’s holoprogram. Unraveling his secrets may be the only way to open his walled off heart.

action.name: I Can't Help Myself. I've Fallen In Love With You.

crew_archetypes.name: Festive Manuele Atoa
crew_archetypes.flavor: At Jadzia's bachelorette party, Lieutenant Manuele Atoa performs a fire dance that ignites the crowd’s excitement.

action.name: Thank For Getting Me The Day Off

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rizzo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ensign Rizzo managed to hold out after the dikironium cloud’s attack just long enough to confirm for Kirk that it was intelligent.

crew_archetypes.name: Maab
crew_archetypes.flavor: While playing to both the Klingons and Federation in the mining negotiations, Maab assassinated the current Teer and seized power.

action.name: I Begin To Like You, Earthman...

crew_archetypes.name: Fähnrich Marie Kaplan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Mitglied der Crew der USS Voyager, das bei der Beantwortung eines Notrufs ums Leben kam.

crew_archetypes.name: Jhet'leya
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein lange totgeglaubtes Crewmitglied, das zur Voyager zurückkehrte und von den Aliens verfolgt wurde, die es wiederbelebte.

action.name: Es gibt für alles ein erstes Mal

crew_archetypes.name: Emony Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

crew_archetypes.name: Rites of Separation Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: While vacationing on Risa, Leeta and Bashir amicably end their relationship with the ancient Bajoran Rite of Separation.

crew_archetypes.name: First Clerk Leeta
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though her title is First Clerk, Leeta may be wielding more power than her position suggests. …or is she?

action.name: Also, The Nagus Would Like You To Dance For Him

crew_archetypes.name: Sidney La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sidney “Crash” La Forge mirrors her father’s kindness, loyalty and determination, which she displays when all seems lost aboard the Titan-A.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Sidney La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sidney La Forge, like everyone else 25 and under, is assimilated by the Borg through a signal that activates DNA placed in her body by the transporter.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Dexter Remmick
crew_archetypes.flavor: Unter dem Einfluss eines Parasiten infiltriert Remmick mit ruchlosen Absichten das Kommando der Sternenflotte.

crew_archetypes.name: AGIMUS
crew_archetypes.flavor: AGIMUS has a knack for sowing discord in order to upload himself into position of power.

action.name: You Are Too Late, AGIMUS Reigns!

crew_archetypes.name: Victorious AGIMUS
crew_archetypes.flavor: AGIMUS is sure he won after 'convincing' Boimler to connect him to the ship's computer, but is the machine about to 'Boim' himself?

action.name: This Planet... Nay, This System... Will Be Mine!
Bei meinen Pfoten und Schnurrhaaren, ich komme zu spät!

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Seska
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seska diente auf der Val Jean als Teil des Maquis und entpuppte sich später als cardassianische Agentin, die sich als Bajoranerin getarnt hatte.

crew_archetypes.name: Kazon Seska
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem sie die Voyager verlassen hatte, schloss sie sich den Kazon als Vertraute des Ersten Maje Culluh an.

crew_archetypes.name: Seska (Maquis-Übernahme)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Jahr nach ihrem Tod hinterlässt Seska in einem eingestellten Holoprogramm eine letzte Überraschung für die Crew der Voyager.

crew_archetypes.name: Seska and Culluh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seska and Culluh teamed up to gain advanced Starfleet technology. To achieve their goals, they often resorted to manipulation and tricks.

crew_archetypes.name: Jaglom Shrek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein yridianischer Informationsvermittler, der Worf die falsche Hoffnung verkaufte, sein Vater sei noch am Leben.

crew_archetypes.name: Ibudan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Smuggler, murderer and generally unpleasant person. He escaped from prison with the sole purpose of taking revenge on Odo.

action.name: You'd Better Ask Your Federation Superiors About That One

crew_archetypes.name: Glinn Damar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Damar war an Bord des Frachters Groumall und diente bei zahlreichen Gelegenheiten unter Dukat als Stellvertreter des Kommandierenden Offiziers.

crew_archetypes.name: Revolutionär Damar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Damar war der Anführer der cardassianischen Revolution gegen das Dominion und wurde kurz vor dem letzten Angriff von den Jem'hadar getötet.

crew_archetypes.name: Legate Damar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Damar’s dedication to Cardassia came into conflict with his devotion to his mentor Dukat, whose own aims were coming into question.

action.name: I Demand To Know Where We Are Going

crew_archetypes.name: T'Les
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Les’ life becomes increasingly complicated as a result of T’Pol’s time aboard the Enterprise and her actions at P’Jem, even seeing her forced out of the Vulcan Science Academy.

action.name: There's More To Life Than One's Profession

crew_archetypes.name: Pe'Nar Makull
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pe’Nar was sure that polaric energy would destroy his world, so he sabotaged the plant - leading to the destruction he so feared.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Kurn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kurn, Sohn von Mogh, nahm am Offiziers-Austauschprogramm teil, um seinen Bruder Worf nach langer Zeit wiederzutreffen.

crew_archetypes.name: Richard Castillo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Castillo übernimmt nach dem Tod von Captain Garrett das Kommando auf der Enterprise C.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Rayner
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Captain of the USS Antares has a gruff manner, but it is the way his history with Moll and L’ak clouds his judgment that worries Burnham.

action.name: I See You Started Without Me

crew_archetypes.name: Samantha Wildman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Samantha served as a xenobiologist on the U.S.S. Voyager ship. Her life and family changed forever during her time in the Delta Quadrant.

crew_archetypes.name: Elnor (schwermütig)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Elnor trauert um Picard, der in seinem Leben eine so wichtige Rolle gespielt hat.

crew_archetypes.name: Qalankhkai Elnor
crew_archetypes.flavor: After reuniting, Elnor takes up Picard’s lost cause per his Qowat Milat training.

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Elnor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Transported by Q to an alternate timeline, Elnor finds himself in great danger due to his Romulan heritage.

crew_archetypes.name: Kivas Fajo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kivas Fajo ist ein Sammler äußerst seltener, merkwürdiger und manchmal illegaler Dinge. Er täuschte Datas Tod vor, um den Androiden seiner Sammlung hinzuzufügen.

crew_archetypes.name: Rejac (Fackelträger)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wächter des Leuchtfeuer des Kahless.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Robert DeSoto
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the USS Hood, DeSoto delivers a sensitive mission and specialist to the “Galaxy boys” aboard the Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Wyatt Earp
crew_archetypes.flavor: Diese Kopie einer Berühmtheit aus dem Wilden Westen der USA wurde von den Melkoten erschaffen, um einen Landungstrupp der Enterprise bestehend aus Kirk, Spock, Pille, Scotty und Chekov zu bestrafen. Zudem hält er sie für Mitglieder der Clanton-Bande.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk joins a landing party to study a strange comet and prevent it from colliding with Persephone III

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: As part of the landing party, Sam went to Valeo Beta V to find out what happened to the USS Peregrine.

action.name: We Need To Alert The Rest Of The Crew

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Sam Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Starfleet officer, xenoanthropologist, who spends a lot of time in his laboratory

crew_archetypes.name: Erster Goran'Agar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Goran'Agar überlebte einen Absturz. Er produziert die Droge Ketracel-White auf natürliche Weise selbst.

crew_archetypes.name: Buckley
crew_archetypes.flavor: The alien protecting Oriana that has been infected by Gorn eggs, which hatch and lead to a violent confrontation.

crew_archetypes.name: Archer (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer stahl als Erster Offizier der ISS Enterprise im 22. Jahrhundert die USS Defiant von den Tholianern.

action.name: Jetzt siehst du mich und jetzt …
Glück hatte nichts damit zu tun

crew_archetypes.name: Archer und Porthos (Camping)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer nimmt Porthos auf eine Forschungsmission auf einen Klasse-M-Planeten mit, der später als Archer IV bekannt wird.

action.name: Dorthin gehen, wo noch kein Hund zuvor gewesen ist

crew_archetypes.name: Twilight Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: The anterograde amnesia from a parasitic infection leaves him confused and unable to serve as captain.

crew_archetypes.name: Carpenter Street Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer and T’Pol end up in 2004 Detroit and must stop the Xindi Reptilians.

action.name: Try to Stay Out of Trouble

crew_archetypes.name: Federation President Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: After years of service in Starfleet and the Federation Council, Archer was elected President of the Federation, a post he held for 8 years.

crew_archetypes.name: First Flight Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer steals the NX-Beta, intent on proving the capability of his father’s warp engine and ensuring the NX Project proceeds.

action.name: Sherlock Holmes Has Nothing On You

crew_archetypes.name: Zero Hour Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer defeats Dolim and blows up the reactor to destroy the Xindi Superweapon once and for all.

crew_archetypes.name: Water Polo Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: An avid fan of water polo, having made it all the way to North American regionals, Archer still keeps a memento in the form of a ball in his cabin.

action.name: One Part Basketball, One Part Swimming, One Part Wrestling

crew_archetypes.name: Surak Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: While Archer’s carrying Surak’s katra, the father of Vulcan logic has much to share with him.

action.name: I Felt Something Inside... My Head

crew_archetypes.name: Sickbay Archer and Porthos
crew_archetypes.flavor: Archer's beloved dog Porthos is seriously ill. To save his friend, Archer is ready to do anything, even assist during an operation.

action.name: My Only Concern Right Now Is Porthos

crew_archetypes.name: Stormfront Archer
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Enterprise shuttle arrives on Earth, but Archer finds himself not at headquarters, but in the thick of World War II.

action.name: We're Not Quite Home Yet, But It's Good To Be Back

crew_archetypes.name: Badgey
crew_archetypes.flavor: A virtual tutor developed by Ensign Rutherford, Badgey can walk you through any Starfleet exercise you can imagine.

action.name: Hi, Can I Teach You A Lesson?

crew_archetypes.name: Corrupted Badgey
crew_archetypes.flavor: Corrupted by his creator’s abuse, Badgey seeks revenge on Rutherford and those he cares about.

action.name: Can I Teach You A Lesson?
Es ist noch nicht aller Tage Abend

crew_archetypes.name: Liana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Liana hat noch nie jemanden außer ihrem Vater und den Hologrammen gesehen. Als sie die Crew der Enterprise kennenlernt, entwickelt sie schnell Gefühle für Tucker.

crew_archetypes.name: L'Kar
crew_archetypes.flavor: L’Kar served as a sorter on the Cosmia’s ship, and later joined the D’Vana Tendi’s pirate ship.

action.name: I Would Rather Die Than Return To My Childhood Dungeon!

crew_archetypes.name: Ryn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though Ryn is forced to implant explosives in his fellow slaves’ necks, he looks out for them and wants to overthrow Osyraa.

action.name: Who's Ready To Get Out Of Here?

crew_archetypes.name: Counselor der Xindi-Aquarianer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Mitglied des Xindi-Rats diskutiert der Botschafter der Xindi-Aquarianer mit Archer darüber, ob die Sphärenbauer sie hintergangen haben.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Simon van Gelder
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented psychologist and the director of Tantalus Penal Colony. His memories were secretly damaged by his colleague Dr. Adams.

action.name: Edited, Adjusted, Subverted Me, But I Won't Forget!
Ich sterbe nicht für mich, ich sterbe für euch

crew_archetypes.name: Jennifer Sisko (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jennifer war eine Wissenschaftlerin der KCA und wurde von Ben Sisko der Terranischen Rebellion rekrutiert.

crew_archetypes.name: Jennifer Sisko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jennifer mag fort sein, aber sie ist noch immer Bestandteil von Bens Existenz.

crew_archetypes.name: Sarin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Disillusioned with the Cabal’s activities, Sarin created her own resistance movement.

action.name: The Price Of Evolution Was Too High

crew_archetypes.name: L'ak
crew_archetypes.flavor: In love with Moll, L’ak ran away from his family and then went with Moll in search of the Progenitor technology.

crew_archetypes.name: Die Hansens
crew_archetypes.flavor: Die Hansens haben die erste Forschungsmission zu den Borg unternommen, die ein schreckliches Ende fand.

crew_archetypes.name: Osyraa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Osyraas diplomatische Verhandlungen mit der Föderation scheiterten, kaperte sie die USS Discovery und griff das Hauptquartier der Föderation an.

crew_archetypes.name: Beto Ortegas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Erica Ortegas' brother is a film director and he comes to the Enterprise to film the centennial Federation Day.

crew_archetypes.name: Agmar
crew_archetypes.flavor: A representative of a race of intelligent plants and the primary contact with the crew of U.S.S. Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Kyheem (Hüter)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kyheem fungiert als Hüter des Schutzgebietes, um die Ernten der Kwejianer vor den Seeheuschrecken zu schützen.

crew_archetypes.name: Ikhu Zhen Kyheem
crew_archetypes.flavor: After a long grudge against his brother, Kyheem reconciles with him and even asks him to perform the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his son.

crew_archetypes.name: Antedeaner-Attentäter
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dieser Attentäter hat sich mit seinem Kumpanen als Botschafter verkleidet, um so an Bord der Enterprise-D zu gelangen und bei einer anstehenden Konferenz einen Bombenanschlag zu verüben.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wissenschaftsoffizier auf der USS Enterprise. Er sollte später den Rang eines Captains an Bord der USS Excelsior bekleiden.

crew_archetypes.name: Fechter-Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sulu wurde von dem Psi-2000-Polywasser vergiftet und hielt sich für einen Musketier an Bord der USS Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Captain der USS Excelsior beschützte Sulu die Friedensgespräche auf Khitomer vor Attentätern.

crew_archetypes.name: Sulu (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine große Anzahl niedlicher Tribbles schenkt Sulu Frieden und Ruhe.

crew_archetypes.name: Botanist Sulu
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sulu enjoyed botany as a hobby, taking care of a carnivorous plant he called Gertrude.

crew_archetypes.name: Disguised Daniels
crew_archetypes.flavor: Posing as a steward, Daniels blended in with the USS Enterprise crew in order to capture Silik.

action.name: I Think My Bunkmate Majored In Chaos Theory

crew_archetypes.name: Varani
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented Bajoran musician who dreams of resurrecting the Jaland Forum.

crew_archetypes.name: Trajok
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Humanoid wrestler. During his time on Deep Space 9, he trained Dax in the Galeo-Manada technique.

crew_archetypes.name: Angela Martine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Martine, ein Mitglied der Phasergeschütz-Crew, verlor ihren Verlobten auf tragische Weise an Bord der Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Deral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deral lebt auf Meridian, einem Planeten, der sich alle 60 Jahre zwischen zwei Dimensionen hin- und herbewegt. Deral sucht nach einer Möglichkeit, das zu unterbinden.

action.name: Das läuft nicht ganz so, wie ich es geplant hatte …

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Steve Stevens
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stevens is a good lieutenant commander, but sometimes he seems to have a talent for attracting trouble.

action.name: Nothing Like A Cold Beer After A Smooth Second Contact!

crew_archetypes.name: Gräfin Regina Bartholomew
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine Frau mit guter Erziehung, Witz und Scharfsinn. Intelligent, einfühlsam und abenteuerlustig. Sie wird von dem Professor verehrt.

action.name: Willst du damit andeuten, dass ich es nicht verstehen kann?

crew_archetypes.name: Orion-Captain
crew_archetypes.flavor: Er sollte James T. Kirk auf der Oberfläche eines Asteroiden treffen, um ihm das Strobolin zu geben, das die Orioner von der Huron gestohlen hatten.

action.name: Übergeben Sie Ihre Fracht, oder Sie werden vernichtet

crew_archetypes.name: Kevin Uxbridge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein unsterbliches Wesen, das sich dem Frieden verschrieben hat und mit den Folgen seines Zorns und seiner Trauer ringt.

action.name: Sie begreifen nicht das Ausmaß meines Verbrechens

crew_archetypes.name: Ungehorsamer Seemann
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sie ist gegen jegliche Art von Verboten, auch gegen das Verbot von romulanischem Whiskey.

crew_archetypes.name: Bat'leth Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Overindulging on Romulan ale, Mariner gets carried away with a bat’leth.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beckett Mariner is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. She breaks dumb rules that shouldn’t be there so she can do a better job!

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner breaks protocol by using magnetic boots a little too often, which explains why the Cerritos forgot her on a satellite in space.

crew_archetypes.name: Vindicta Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Vinpocalypse, marauder Vindicta is determined to take down Captain Freeman at any cost--preferably on a rickety catwalk.

crew_archetypes.name: Deep Space Nine Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: From blackmailing Quark to breaking Worf’s mek'leth, what other adventures did Mariner have aboard Deep Space Nine?

action.name: Man! It’s Like a New Thing Every Week With Those Guys!

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a training drill, Mariner must take the place of her mirror universe counterpart. Unfortunately, Mariner is outed by Mirror Boimler.

action.name: Seriously, Why Is This Drill Still Going?!

crew_archetypes.name: Wanted Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: During the drill, Mariner tries on the role of the wanted captain of the three-man away group.

crew_archetypes.name: Rock'n'Roll Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner played a heavy metal song so inspired and loud that even a nearby Klingon ship could appreciate it.

crew_archetypes.name: Exoarchaeologist Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an attempt to find herself, Mariner is transferred to the Independent Archaeologist Guilds. However, despite her adventures to save the Golden Idol, she realizes that she misses Starfleet.

action.name: How Many Old Brown Pots Do We Really Need?

crew_archetypes.name: Displaced Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mariner and Boimler end up on the 23rd century Enterprise. While Pike looks for ways to send them home, Mariner studies the people around her with interest.

action.name: Look, It Was All Me, Okay?

crew_archetypes.name: Aged Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: What is happening, and why does Mariner get older and older as she approaches the pergium? Is this some kind of joke?

crew_archetypes.name: Detective Mariner
crew_archetypes.flavor: Of all the holoprograms on the Cerritos, why did Boimler have to fire up this one? Mariner finds Dixon Hill to be an old man’s program.

action.name: Come On, Boims, Let's Do Something Fun!

crew_archetypes.name: Chairman Siggi
crew_archetypes.flavor: A fanatical collector who not only wanted to steal someone else's collection, but also tricked Starfleet into it.

action.name: Take My Card. I Got A Top-Notch Menagerie.

crew_archetypes.name: Salia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Kind von Eltern aus rivalisierenden Fraktionen ist Salia dazu bestimmt, ihr Volk als neutrale Herrscherin anzuführen.

action.name: Vergiss nicht, wir sind immer bei dir

crew_archetypes.name: Counselor Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Schiffs-Counselor auf der USS Enterprise-D. Ihre empathischen Fähigkeiten waren für die Besatzung von unschätzbarem Wert.

crew_archetypes.name: Rakal Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi war als Major Rakal des Tal Shiar verkleidet und hatte den Auftrag, den Romulanern zu helfen, zur Föderation überzulaufen.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi war auf der Erde des 21. Jahrhunderts gestrandet und half dabei, Cochrane zu überzeugen, seinen historischen Flug zu starten.

crew_archetypes.name: Brückenoffizier Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi wird zum Commander befördert, nachdem sie den Test als Brückenoffizier abgelegt hat.

crew_archetypes.name: Göttin der Empathie Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Schiffscounselor Deanna Troi wurde in einem Holodeck-Programm von Reginald Barclay als Göttin der Empathie dargestellt.

crew_archetypes.name: Durango Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deanna war schon immer ein großer Fan des Wilden Westens und spielte die Rolle der Durango im Deadwood-Holoprogramm.

action.name: Machen Sie es sich nicht zu bequem

crew_archetypes.name: Troi (Nepenthe)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi nutzt ihre Erfahrung als Counselor und Mutter, um Soji zu erreichen und Picard auf Nepenthe zu beraten.

crew_archetypes.name: Deanna Troi (Braut)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deanna feiert ihre Hochzeit ihrem menschlichen Erbe entsprechend mit einem traditionellen Empfang.

action.name: Sie brauchen sich keine Sorgen machen

crew_archetypes.name: Night Terrors Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the Enterprise finds itself drifting through a space-time anomaly, Troi becomes the only crew member who can still dream. But those dreams are nightmares during which she may not be alone.

crew_archetypes.name: Stretching Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Troi worries that she is losing control and shares her romantic feelings with Crusher during training.

action.name: Is It Possible To Fall In Love In One Day?

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to her empathic abilities, Troi managed to save the crew during the final battle with the Borg.

action.name: Why Do I Suddenly Sense The Feeling Of Enjoyment?

crew_archetypes.name: Alternate Reality Deanna Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deanna Troi seems the same, but something is off. It's as if the familiar Troi has suddenly been replaced by a Troi from an alternate reality.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Adam Soong
crew_archetypes.flavor: A scientist obsessed with the idea of ​​artificially creating life. He created “daughters”, but they did not live long, despite all his not always legal efforts.

action.name: You Exist Because I Willed It

crew_archetypes.name: Kahless der Unvergessliche
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kahless wurde im Labor des Boreth-Klosters geklont und ist der rechtmäßige Anwärter auf die Krone des Klingonischen Reichs.

crew_archetypes.name: Human Silik
crew_archetypes.flavor: In human form, Silik teams up with Archer after traveling back in time to find schematics for the temporal conduit.

action.name: I'd Come To Believe Your Race Was Inherently… Unaggressive

crew_archetypes.name: West (Klingonisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um den Präsidenten der Föderation zu ermorden, tarnte sich Colonel West als Klingone.

crew_archetypes.name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rasmussen ist ein Erfinder aus dem 22. Jahrhundert, der sich als Historiker ausgibt, um Dinge von der Enterprise D zu stehlen.

action.name: Tut mir leid, dass es synthetisiert ist

crew_archetypes.name: Degraded Sphere-Builder
crew_archetypes.flavor: Promised freedom in exchange for participating in an experiment, this Sphere Builder learned that his only freedom might come in complete cellular degradation.

action.name: When The Xindi Destroy Earth, My People Will Prevail

crew_archetypes.name: Omet'iklan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fierce and true to his principles, Omet'iklan joined the crew of the USS Defiant after his ship was destroyed.

crew_archetypes.name: Gannet Brooks
crew_archetypes.flavor: Journalist and ex-lover of Mayweather. Suspected of spying for Terra Prime, but acquitted after the real spy was caught.

action.name: We Never Had A Problem Mixing Work And Pleasure

crew_archetypes.name: President T'Rina
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Gamble
crew_archetypes.flavor: An eager fledgeling nurse with a promising career ahead, nothing less than one of the greatest evils in the galaxy could stop him.

action.name: Now It's My Time To Shine

crew_archetypes.name: General Martok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Martok war ein fähiger Krieger, General und Kanzler des Klingonischen Reichs.

crew_archetypes.name: Martok (23. Jahrhundert)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine im Klingonischen Reich des 23. Jahrhunderts geborene Version von Martok aus einem alternativen Universum.

action.name: Du hast dich in allem geirrt

crew_archetypes.name: Stamets (taktisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stamets verband die Discovery mit dem Sporenantrieb und begab sich teilweise ins Myzel-Netzwerk, um Tilly und May zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Stamets
crew_archetypes.flavor: The dangerous journeys are over and the best ending to it all is sharing the happiness of your longtime colleague and friend at his wedding.

crew_archetypes.name: Croden
crew_archetypes.flavor: The male Rakhari resisted and fled the government that killed his wives. He tried to save his daughter, though not through the most honest of means.

action.name: Sometimes I Do Tell The Truth

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Nevesa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nevesa, die Kommandantin eines romulanischen Schiffs, wird von der Crew der Enterprise inhaftiert, als sie versuchte, Spock am Verlassen ihres Schiffs zu hindern.

action.name: Man kann überall hin, zu jeder Zeit

crew_archetypes.name: Guinan (19. Jahrhundert)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Guinan begegnet Picard zum "ersten" Mal Ende des 19. Jahrhunderts, als er versucht, Datas Tod zu verhindern.

crew_archetypes.name: Young Guinan
crew_archetypes.flavor: The sight of a familiar face gives Picard a spark of hope, but Guinan hasn’t yet encountered him and wants no part of whatever he is into.

crew_archetypes.name: Festive Guinan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with everyone else, Guinan celebrates the wedding of Riker and Troi, and also talks about her own past and future marriages.

crew_archetypes.name: Mark and Mollie
crew_archetypes.flavor: Janeway leaves for Voyager, but her fiancé Mark still has an equally important mission - to look after her dog Mollie.

action.name: Is This Another 'Love Me, Love My Dog' Demand?

crew_archetypes.name: The Subspace Abductor
crew_archetypes.flavor: This solanogen-based lifeform used a subspace pocket to abduct Enterprise crew members for medical experiments.

crew_archetypes.name: Ixtana'Rax
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

action.name: Wir sind schon etwas weiter, als dass wir uns um deine Wünsche sorgen

crew_archetypes.name: Leck
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ferengi eliminator who cared more for combat than currency. He called out Quark’s attempt to cheat him, but also asked to join future jobs.

crew_archetypes.name: Kukulkan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kukulkan, der nach Tausenden von Jahren wieder auftaucht, ist erzürnt, dass sich kaum jemand an ihn erinnert, und droht, alles Leben an Bord der Enterprise auszulöschen.

action.name: Alle von eurer Art sollen untergehen!

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Vasso L'Gaelia
crew_archetypes.flavor: During negotiations for a potential alliance, Captain Vasso left the Federation delegates baffled by his R’ongovian radical empathy.

crew_archetypes.name: Aurelio
crew_archetypes.flavor: Feeling indebted to Osyraa, Aurellio continued to work for her. But, learning more about her cruelty, his devotion faded away.

action.name: Is It… Safe To Work Here?

crew_archetypes.name: Chefarzt Pulaski
crew_archetypes.flavor: Erste Medizinische Offizierin der USS Enterprise D im Jahr 2365. Sie hat außerdem auf der USS Repulse gedient.

action.name: Warum willst du es mir nicht sagen?

crew_archetypes.name: Lady Sirella
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lady Sirella muss als Herrin des Hauses des Martok zustimmen, wenn jemand durch Heirat dem Haus beitreten will.

crew_archetypes.name: Zho'Kaan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stuck on a moon with Tucker, Zho’Kaan must figure out how to communicate with him so they can work together to escape.

crew_archetypes.name: Spy Rumdar
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Pakled spy cannot really tell the difference between the Cerritos and the Enterprise, or between the bathroom and an airlock.

crew_archetypes.name: Subcommander T'Rul
crew_archetypes.flavor: Aufgrund des Abkommens zwischen der Föderation und den Romulanern wurde T'Rul auf der Defiant stationiert, um die Tarnvorrichtung zu bedienen.

action.name: Nicht hier, um Freunde zu finden

crew_archetypes.name: Riley Frazier
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riley war Wissenschaftsoffizier an Bord der USS Roosevelt und wurde während der Schacht bei Wolf 359 assimiliert.

crew_archetypes.name: Dysek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dysek is a talented physician, but part of a system that allocates care not by need, but by assumed importance. However, he supported the Doctor in his desire to change the system.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kommunikationsoffizierin an Bord der Enterprise. Hoshi Satos Erlebnisse brachten sie dazu, einen universellen Linguacode zu entwickeln.

crew_archetypes.name: Imperatorin Sato (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als sie die Defiant im Spiegeluniversum übernimmt, krönt sie sich selbst zur Imperatorin des Terranischen Imperiums.

crew_archetypes.name: Sato (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sato nimmt den ersten Kontakt mit einem freundlichen Tribble unter der Obhut von Dr. Phlox positiv auf.

crew_archetypes.name: Tourist Hoshi Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoshi enjoys learning the language of the places she visits. And she fascinates a Risan couple by learning their language and being able to keep up the conversation.

action.name: Na. No. How Am I Doing?

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Hoshi Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hoshi takes part in her first away mission and has to overcome her own fears and doubts.

action.name: Well, I Just, I Bit My Lip And Got Through It

crew_archetypes.name: Pick-up Game Sato
crew_archetypes.flavor: There are many ways to prove oneself on a starship, including holding your own in a game of pick-up basketball.

action.name: Time To Switch Sides Again, Doctor

crew_archetypes.name: Adira Tal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Adira, die jetzt mit dem Trill-Symbiont Tal verschmolzen ist, besitzt nun alle Erinnerungen ihrer vorherigen Leben.

crew_archetypes.name: Adira (xaheanisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Adira gab sich als Xaheanerin aus, um Medizin zum Außenteam auf Theta Zeta zu schmuggeln.

crew_archetypes.name: Cellistin Adira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um ihren Verlust und die Umstellung nach dem Beitritt zu verarbeiten, spielt Adira Cello und versucht so, mit Gray in Kontakt zu kommen.

action.name: Wie kommt es, dass du hier bist?

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Adira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with Discovery, Adira goes on their first away mission to repair Deep Space Repair Beta Six because of their experience with programmable matter.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Adira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Following the defeat of the Emerald Chain, Adira became part of the Starfleet and joined the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery as an ensign.

action.name: Uh, Captain, We... We Have A Problem.

crew_archetypes.name: Paul Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though he resented Travis for leaving, Paul was able to fill his father’s shoes as captain thanks to some help from his brother.

action.name: You Do Remember How To Fly This Ship?

crew_archetypes.name: Ilon Tandro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ilon Tandro came to Deep Space Nine to extradite Jadzia Dax, seeking justice for his father, whom he believed had been betrayed by Curzon Dax.

action.name: This Is Not At All Relevant.

crew_archetypes.name: Master Surchid Falow
crew_archetypes.flavor: Representing the Wadi, Falow enjoys sharing parts of their culture with the Federation, like their complex and intricate table games.

action.name: Double The Peril, Double Your Winnings

crew_archetypes.name: Prince Billups
crew_archetypes.flavor: Despite all his mother’s tricks and deceptions, Billups never became king and remained in Starfleet.

action.name: This Is A New Low, Mother

crew_archetypes.name: T'Mir
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Besatzungsmitglied eines vulkanischen Wissenschaftsschiffs, das auf der Erde abgestürzt war, übernahm T'Mir das Kommando über die Überlebenden.

crew_archetypes.name: Moll
crew_archetypes.flavor: Moll is confident that Progenitor technology can bring her anything she needs, including bringing the dead back to life.

action.name: I Know What It's Like To Be On The Outside, Alone

crew_archetypes.name: Moll & L'ak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Desperate and in love, Moll and L'ak are ready to go together until the end, even if it means breaking a thousand laws.

crew_archetypes.name: Primarch Ruhn
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a member of the royal family, Ruhn intended to use L’ak to take the throne.

action.name: We Will Defeat All Who Stand Against Us

crew_archetypes.name: Die Duras-Schwestern
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Duras sisters prosecuted a civil war to replace Gowron as Chancellor with their nephew Toral.

crew_archetypes.name: Zobral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Zobral führt seinen Clan im Kampf gegen die Unterdrückung des herrschenden Clans der Torothaner auf seiner Heimatwelt an.

action.name: Ich bin nicht für sie verantwortlich

crew_archetypes.name: Twin Mistresses of Evil
crew_archetypes.flavor: A pair of villainesses from the Captain Proton holoprogram, played skillfully by twin crew members, Jenny and Megan Delaney.

action.name: You'll Be Our Puppet. Our Slave.
Das ist die Aufgabe eines Fackelträgers

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Phlox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Phlox, der Erste Medizinische Offizier auf der Enterprise, studierte sein Leben lang jegliche medizinische Kunst.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein sadistischer Doktor, der an Bord der ISS Enterprise dient, einem Raumschiff aus dem Spiegeluniversum.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox (Nanosonde)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Phlox mit Nanosonden der Borg infiziert wurde, muss er mehr wie ein Ingenieur und nicht wie ein Arzt denken, um ein Heilmittel zu finden.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox (Raumanzug)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Selbst Phlox muss regelmäßig am Raumanzug-Training teilnehmen.

crew_archetypes.name: Phlox (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Phlox bringt eine kleine Anzahl von Tribbles an Bord der Enterprise NX-01 – als eine nachhaltige Nahrungsquelle für seine Haustiere.

crew_archetypes.name: Starfleet Medical Phlox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doctor Phlox is busy treating Klaang, who was injured by the Plasma Cannon.

action.name: I'll Do The Best I Can

crew_archetypes.name: Sickbay Phlox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Maybe Phlox doesn't know what Malcolm's favorite dish is. But it can lead to the right thoughts, guided by the patient’s card.

crew_archetypes.name: Su'Kal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Su'Kal lebt in einem Hologramm, das seine Mutter vor ihrem Tod geschaffen hat. Um gerettet zu werden, muss er sich seiner größten Angst stellen – einer anderen Realität.

crew_archetypes.name: Chancellor Azetbur
crew_archetypes.flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assassination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Esmar
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the assimilation of Starfleet’s youngest, Esmar took control of the USS Titan.

crew_archetypes.name: Botschafter Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Botschafter von Vulkan. Er war der Vater von Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Sarek (Würdenträger)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sarek verbirgt sein Herzleiden und behauptet sich gegen einen besonders hartnäckigen Tellariten.

crew_archetypes.name: Legaran Delegate Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: In spite of Bendii Syndrome weakening his emotional control, Sarek is able to complete negotiations with the Legarans thanks to Picard’s help.

crew_archetypes.name: Concerned Father Sarek
crew_archetypes.flavor: After finding Spock's katra, Sarek threw all his strength into getting his son back, not guided by logic at all.

action.name: My Logic Is Uncertain Where My Son Is Concerned

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Bryce
crew_archetypes.flavor: Being promoted to Lieutenant Commander means an increase in duties for Bryce. Will he find time to kitesurf with his new responsibilities?

action.name: I Used to Kitesurf the Biggest Waves on Manark IV

crew_archetypes.name: Booker und Groll
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker ist ein Kurier, der mit Warenlieferungen und Schmuggel genug Dilithium beschaffen will, um mit seiner Königin Groll ein gutes Leben zu haben.

action.name: Ich war noch nie auf der Erde

crew_archetypes.name: Sanctuary Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker ist auf seinen Heimatplaneten Kwejian zurückgekehrt, um ihn vor der Bedrohung durch Osyraa zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Breakthrough Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Booker cautions that pain isn’t how loved ones should be honored, and the 10-C understand. Their empathetic breakthrough halts the DMA.

action.name: That Is The Start of Making Things Right

crew_archetypes.name: Ikhu Zhen Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: According to Kwejian tradition, Booker performed the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his nephew Leto, when a boy becomes a man.

action.name: A Boy Only Becomes A Man Once

crew_archetypes.name: Q'Mau Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: The landing on Q'Mau was especially important for Booker - here he had the opportunity to finally talk openly with Burnham after a long break

action.name: The Further I Am From This, The Better

crew_archetypes.name: Archivist Booker
crew_archetypes.flavor: An artificial intelligence in the form of Archivist Booker helps Burnham pass the Labyrinth of the Mind test.

action.name: Be Able To Be Honest With Yourself

crew_archetypes.name: Kago-Darr
crew_archetypes.flavor: A desperate bounty hunter who, in order to capture Archer for a reward, attacked his longtime rival, but was ultimately defeated.

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Brown
crew_archetypes.flavor: After the tragedy on Exo II, Dr. Brown continued to be Corby's assistant, but now as an android.

crew_archetypes.name: Vezda
crew_archetypes.flavor: A malevolent extradimensional being that inspires fear and terror in some races and divine awe in others.

action.name: Ich bin hier mit euch Sterblichen gefangen

crew_archetypes.name: Jojo Krako
crew_archetypes.flavor: Krako was a gangster boss on Sigma Iotia II who managed to stop the violence between two warring gangs through his actions.

action.name: I Haven't Been Arrested In My Whole Life!

crew_archetypes.name: Bela Oxmyx
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prominent Iotian male, boss of the syndicate that unites all territories on the planet.

crew_archetypes.name: Baron Grimes
crew_archetypes.flavor: Baron Grimes, who made his fortune in arms dealing, was willing to pay handsomely for the capture of Harry Mudd, who had deceived his daughter and stolen her dowry.

action.name: I Would Do Anything For My Daughter

crew_archetypes.name: Princess Thalia and Runa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Princess Thalia will stay behind guarding her little princess Runa. Should King Ridley fall in battle, she will sing an epic song to honor him.

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: While on a mission to Valeo Beta V to find survivors, La'an encounters the Gorn again. She has to overcome her anger in order to help the victims.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: La’an’s gratitude to Una for saving her life shows as she speaks up on her friend and crewmate’s behalf.

action.name: I Wouldn't Be Alive If It Weren't For Una

crew_archetypes.name: 21st Century La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: Together with Kirk, La’an ends up in Toronto, where they not only need to survive, but also find the reactor.

action.name: I'm Not Gonna Stop Now. So Open The Door.

crew_archetypes.name: Quality of Mercy La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an alternate timeline, La’an as commander of the U.S.S. Farragut is tasked with evacuating groups of survivors.

action.name: Am I Glad To See You

crew_archetypes.name: Vulcan La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: The serum not only gave La'an a Vulcan appearance, but also gave her new abilities, for which she later had to apologize.

crew_archetypes.name: Amelia Moon La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the holodeck, La’an didn't deny herself the opportunity to play the role of her favorite character, Detective Amelia Moon.

action.name: Hollywood, California. Mansions, Movie Stars, And Murder.

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane La'an
crew_archetypes.flavor: This cocktail has a very strange effect! Why has everything become so... cartoonish?

crew_archetypes.name: Judge Advocate Prosecutor Batel
crew_archetypes.flavor: At the tribunal in the Chin-Riley case, Batel served as prosecutor - reluctantly.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Batel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Batel was on a mission to Parnassus Beta when her ship USS Cayuga was suddenly attacked by the Gorn.

action.name: I Can't Go With You, You Know That

crew_archetypes.name: Beholder Batel
crew_archetypes.flavor: By adopting the adaptive characteristics of races that have encountered the Vezda, Batel became a Beholder - one who can resist evil.

action.name: I Stay. I Guard. I Never Leave.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vadic and her team not only managed to escape from the trap, but also captured the Titan, getting even closer to their goal of capturing Jack Crusher.

crew_archetypes.name: Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: Hungry for revenge against the Federation for the torment they inflicted on her and the other Changelings, she helps a mysterious entity hunt for Jack Crusher.

action.name: How Very Precise With Your Timing

crew_archetypes.name: Morphing Vadic
crew_archetypes.flavor: The scientist who experimented on Vadic met a gruesome end, their form becoming a vessel for her vengeance.

action.name: You Gave Me The Ability To Mimic Your Blood

crew_archetypes.name: Ulis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain of the Ferengi pirates who infiltrated the USS Enterprise to plunder it. However, the pirates’ greed would be their downfall.

crew_archetypes.name: Morn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Morn hat stets gerne einen Drink an der Theke in Quarks Bar genommen und war bei allen als intelligenter Gesprächspartner beliebt.

crew_archetypes.name: Mourned Morn
crew_archetypes.flavor: Morn faked his own death to avoid his associates’ attempts to steal his bequest. For once, silence pervades the bar at Quark’s.

crew_archetypes.name: Prime Minister Nayrok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Angosian Prime Minister whose attempt to join the Federation was halted not only by rebellion, but also by Nayrok's unwillingness to be open.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Hoya
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Benzite ensign, Hoya died during a mission to Torga IV in the Gamma Quadrant.

crew_archetypes.name: Gul Evek
crew_archetypes.flavor: While in hot pursuit of the Val Jean, Gul Evek's own ship hit a plasma storm and suddenly he had much bigger concerns.

action.name: Cut Your Engines And Prepare To Surrender

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Robert April
crew_archetypes.flavor: Despite moving up to the position of admiral, April still finds himself tethered to the Enterprise and the (mis)adventures of her crew.

action.name: This Bridge Is More Like Home Than Anywhere Else

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. T'Ana
crew_archetypes.flavor: The CMO of USS Cerritos. She has a dry wit and terse bedside manner, but is a trusted doctor to the crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Bankrobber T'Ana
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Ana and Shaxs roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Hands Up Where I Can See Them!

crew_archetypes.name: T'Ana in the Box
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tendi learns something everyone who interacts with felines is bound to learn - no matter how valuable what’s inside the box is, the box itself is the true prize.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team T'Ana
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Ana goes down into the cave to get a medicinal fern.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Tribble
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein besonders beharrlicher Tribble bereitet Kirk Probleme, als er sich während eines Streits mit Klingonen auf dem Stuhl des Captains niederlässt.

action.name: Da ist noch immer was dort draußen
Ich bin ein moderner Generalmajor, wie er im Buche steht

crew_archetypes.name: First Officer Una
crew_archetypes.flavor: Una is a talented helmsman (and singer) serving as First Officer under Captain Pike on the USS Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Huntress Z'ymira
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s hard for Z'ymira to have a relationship with Sir Adya, having sworn her allegiance to the Forest. Still, she can be an ally to King Ridley

action.name: I Can Shoot It With An Arrow, If That Helps

crew_archetypes.name: Una on Trial
crew_archetypes.flavor: Arrested for concealing her identity as an Illyrian, the tribunal ultimately granted Una asylum and returned her to her post.

crew_archetypes.name: Martia
crew_archetypes.flavor: Martia ist eine Chamäleonidin und eine Gefangene in Rura Penthe. Sie versucht, Kirks und McCoys Flucht zu sabotieren.

action.name: Als wir getrennt waren, war es besser
Was für kleine zerbrechliche Wesen ihr doch seid

crew_archetypes.name: Gem
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gem was kidnapped by the Vians. They used her actions to gauge whether or not her people were worthy of salvation.

crew_archetypes.name: U.S.S. Cabot-Hausmeister
crew_archetypes.flavor: Einem Offizier an Bord der USS Cabot wurde die unglückliche Aufgabe erteilt, Larkins modifizierte Tribbles aufzuräumen.

crew_archetypes.name: Tchar (Skorr)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Der Erbprinz der Skorr. Er ist fest entschlossen, sein Volk zu seinen kriegerischen Wurzeln zurückzuführen, und wird dafür alles tun, was nötig ist.

action.name: Ein edler Tod, um einen großen Traum zu verwirklichen

crew_archetypes.name: Mudd (Android)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Selbst die Mudd-Androiden sind wortgewandt und haben immer ein verborgenes Messer im Stiefel, um sich aus schwierigen Situationen zu befreien.

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Mudd
crew_archetypes.flavor: A cunning smuggler, he manages to evade justice time and time again, only to move on to his next criminal pursuit.

action.name: Leo Walsh Is Me Name, Darling

crew_archetypes.name: King Mudd the First
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mudd would not have been Mudd if, having found himself on the planet where he was appointed king, he had not started his illegal affairs.

action.name: But Men Will Always Be Men No Matter Where They Are

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Kovich
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kovich’s insight and experience make him a valuable resource to the Federation and the Discovery crew.

action.name: Guess I'm a Man of Widely Varied Interests

crew_archetypes.name: Wonderland Taylor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Beamed down the rabbit hole, Gillian Taylor is amazed by the transporter technology from the future.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Sela
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sela, die Tochter von Tasha Yar und eines romulanischen Offiziers, arbeitete daran, die Föderation zu schwächen.

crew_archetypes.name: Sela in Shadow
crew_archetypes.flavor: This shadowy figure is the daughter of an alternate timeline Tasha Yar and is sent to drive a wedge between the UFP and the Klingons.

action.name: With Our Cloaking Devices, We Can Slip By You At Will

crew_archetypes.name: Pel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pel verkleidet sich als männlicher Ferengi und wiederlegt durch ihr kaufmännisches Geschick, dass Frauen keinen Profit anhäufen können.

crew_archetypes.name: Yarnek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Yarnek zwingt die Enterprise-Crew zur Erbauung der Excalbianer zu einem Kampf Gut gegen Böse.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Commander Spock war der Erste Offizier auf der USS Enterprise und wurde später zu einem verehrten Mitglied der Föderation.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (genesend)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während er sich auf Vulkan erholte, verbrachte Commander Spock viel Zeit damit, seine logischen Gedanken wieder zu schulen.

action.name: Leben Sie lange und in Frieden

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Erster Offizier auf der ISS Enterprise. Spock war ein erbarmungsloser Offizier im Terranischen Imperium des Spiegeluniversums.

crew_archetypes.name: Botschafter Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Botschafter Spock verschwand und tauchte dann Romulus auf, um die dortige Wiedervereinigungsbewegung mit den Vulkaniern zu unterstützen.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Kal-if-fee)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Kämpfer in einem traditionellen Kal-if-fee-Wettstreit muss Spock gegen Kirk bis zum Tod kämpfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Talos IV)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Prior to serving with Captain Kirk, Spock accompanied Captain Pike on an away mission to Talos IV.

crew_archetypes.name: Arbeiter Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Konstruierte eine mnemonische Speichervorrichtung aus Steinmessern und Bärenfellen.

action.name: Logik ist der erste Schritt zur Weisheit
Mal sehen, was die Zukunft bringt

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Raumanzug)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock spürt eine Verbindung zu V'Ger und entwendet Ausrüstung, um Antworten zu erhalten.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Fal-Tor-Pan)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach der Fal-Tor-Pan-Zeremonie setzt der nun wiederbelebte Spock seine Erinnerungen Stück für Stück wieder zusammen.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock und Kirk (Wiedervereinigung)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Spocks Erinnerungen zurückkehren, versammeln sich Kirk und die Crew der Enterprise um ihn.

action.name: Ich war es und ich werde es immer sein, Ihr Freund.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock vermutet, dass der Tod der Tribbles durch etwas hervorgerufen wurde, was sie zusammen mit dem Getreide gegessen haben.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock und I-Chaya
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock trifft sein Sehlat-Haustier aus der Kindheit wieder, als er sein eigenes Verschwinden aus der Geschichte untersucht.

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Platonier)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock wird zu einem telekinetischen Spielzeug gemacht, nachdem es ihm nicht gelungen ist, an den Sinn für Logik der Platonier zu appellieren.

action.name: Gebt Acht, junge Damen, und bewahrt euren Wein …

crew_archetypes.name: Spock (Gefangener)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mit Hilfe der Talosianer zeigt Spock Burnham, wie und warum er aus dem Krankenhaus geflohen ist und dass er niemanden getötet hat.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock begins his tenure on the Enterprise under the command of Captain Pike.

crew_archetypes.name: Wizard Pollux Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pollux the wizard, brother of Caster. Maybe Spock is another victim of the fantasy illusion from “The Kingdom of Elysian”, but my god! Look at that hair!

crew_archetypes.name: Spock as T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: The soul-sharing ritual went wrong, but this could be a relationship opportunity for Spock. He deals with T’Pring’s duties in his own style.

action.name: This Is Coming Dangerously Close To Antics

crew_archetypes.name: Paradise Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Omicron Ceti III, Spock is exposed to euphoric flower spores that provide pleasure and enjoyment.

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: While looking for survivors on Valeo Beta V, Spock must confront the terrifying force of his own emotions.

action.name: Captain, There's More Blood Over Here

crew_archetypes.name: Projector Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock finds comedy a difficult concept to grasp, as his blooper reel at the holiday party is more about pain than pleasure.

crew_archetypes.name: Henoch Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock's body was taken over by the Arretan Henoch, who, using Spock, intended to kill Sargon in Kirk's body.

action.name: Just Think How Much We Can Do For Mankind

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock discovers that his arms have become too flexible. The crew begins to wonder what is really in the cocktails.

action.name: My Arms Don't Normally Do This

crew_archetypes.name: Klingon Ambassador Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock goes to the Klingons to settle the misunderstanding between them over bloodwine.

crew_archetypes.name: Engaged Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spock temporarily lost his Vulcan DNA. But with dinner ahead with T’Pring’s parents, he cannot reveal that he has become human.

crew_archetypes.name: Imperturbable Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: The struggle with yourself to regain control over your emotions is no more difficult than any other battle.

action.name: I Am In Control Of My Emotions

crew_archetypes.name: Tezaar Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: For the expedition to Tezaar, the crew had to take a serum to turn into Vulcans. Everyone except Spock.

action.name: Being Vulcan Is The Most Logical Thing One Can Do

crew_archetypes.name: Giant Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Created by Keniclius in a misguided attempt to bring about peace, Spock Two must mind meld with his original to save him.

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilierter Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Could the greatest threat to the Federation by the Borg be one of its greatest heroes?

crew_archetypes.name: Intendantin Kira (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Intendantin des bajoranischen Sektors der Klingonisch-Cardassianischen Allianz wurde Kira von Terranischen Rebellen inhaftiert.

crew_archetypes.name: Verkleidete Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als bajoranische Gefangene verkleidet gelingt es Kira, sich in ein cardassianisches Lager zu schleichen und den Anführer des Widerstands Li Nalas zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira (Cardassianerin)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira wurde vom Obsidianischen Orden entführt und verändert, um Tekeny Ghemor als Dissidenten zu entlarven.

crew_archetypes.name: Niners Kira Nerys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira spielt als Shortstop in Siskos Baseballteam für die Niners gegen die Logicians der Vulkanier.

crew_archetypes.name: Anastasia Komananov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach einem Transporterunfall wird Kiras Bild von einem Holosuite-Programm benutzt, um eine sowjetische Geheimagentin darzustellen.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kira Nerys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um den Kontakt mit den cardassianischen Rebellen herzustellen, wurde Kira von der Sternenflotte kurzfristig befördert.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira (Breen-Verkleidung)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine verkleidete Kira bringt Dukat zur Vernunft, bevor seiner Tochter Leid zugefügt wird.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira (Luma Rahl)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira reist in die Vergangenheit und lebt dort als Luma Rahl, um die Wahrheit über die letzten Lebensjahre ihrer Mutter herauszufinden.

crew_archetypes.name: Kira (Prophetin)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kira wäre bereit gewesen, sich den Propheten hinzugeben, ohne Rücksicht auf die Konsequenzen, selbst wenn dies ihren Tod bedeutet hätte.

action.name: Ich werde versuchen, dich nicht zu enttäuschen

crew_archetypes.name: Hippie Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: While trying to find Sisko, Kira, along with O’Brien, ends up in the late 1960s, where they encounter a pair of hippies.

crew_archetypes.name: Surrogate Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Life aboard Deep Space Nine can be hectic, but nothing can stop Kira, even when she's carrying a baby for the O'Briens.

action.name: Sometimes Innocence is Just an Excuse for the Guilty

crew_archetypes.name: Lela Kira
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lela was Dax's first host and one of the first women to serve as a council member. Kira did not hesitate to host such a remarkable figure.

action.name: What is a Person, But The Sum of Their Memories?

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Kira Nerys
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nerys keeps things running on Deep Space Nine, with a few curveballs from Quark every now and then.

crew_archetypes.name: Peldor Joi Kira
