crew_archetypes.flavor: Telek R'Mor führte Forschungsarbeiten in der Nähe eines Wurmlochs durch und willigte ein, eine Nachricht der gestrandeten USS Voyager zu übermitteln.

crew_archetypes.name: Koloth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Commander des klingonischen Schiffs IKS Gr'oth traf Koloth auf der Raumstation K7 auf Kirk.

crew_archetypes.name: Koloths und Korax (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Not even the genetically engineered tribble hunting Glommer can manage to dig Koloth and Korax out of this particular pile of troubles.

crew_archetypes.name: Kilana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kilana kommandiert einen Trupp Jem'Hadar und befiehlt ihnen, Siskos Crew anzugreifen, um einen verwundeten Gründer zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Ermittler Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo wurde von den Cardassianern während der Besatzung von Bajor zum Dienst gezwungen.

crew_archetypes.name: Constable Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo zeichnete sich als Sicherheitschef auf Deep Space Nine durch eine hohe Präsenz auf der Station aus.

crew_archetypes.name: Odo (Händler)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo tarnt sich als Händler, um gemeinsam mit der Crew der Defiant die Ermordung von Captain Kirk durch einen zeitreisenden Klingonen zu vereiteln.

crew_archetypes.name: Schiedsrichter Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als unparteiischer Beobachter wird Odo gebeten, als Schiedsrichter ein Baseballspiel zwischen den Niners und Logicians zu leiten.

crew_archetypes.name: Gestrandeter Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo und Quark stürzen mit einem Shuttle ab und müssen sich gegenseitig helfen, um zu überleben.

crew_archetypes.name: Geldbote Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Zusammen mit Nog stiehlt Odo das Geld aus dem Safe im Zählraum von Frankies Casino.

crew_archetypes.name: Kodrak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kodrak is the Klingon alias of Odo. In the guise of Kodrak, he had the opportunity to get closer to the Founder and expose him.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mirror Odo's desire for order and obedience made the Ore Processing Center very efficient. However, not everyone approved of his methods.

crew_archetypes.name: Caregiver Odo
crew_archetypes.flavor: Odo is trying his best to nurse the sick shapeshifting infant back to health, and even small progress brings him incredible delight.

action.name: Do You Know What You Are? You're a Changeling.

crew_archetypes.name: Dulmur und Lucsly (Agenten)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dulmur und Lucsly werden beauftragt, auf ihre unnachahmlich humorlose Art und Weise Siskos Zeit an Bord von Kirks Enterprise zu untersuchen.

crew_archetypes.name: Rurigan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Männlicher Yaderaner, der auf Yadera Prime lebte, bis es erobert wurde. Dann schuf er eine holographische Nachbildung seines zerstörten Dorfes.

action.name: Und wie willst du das anstellen?

crew_archetypes.name: Farek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Farek takes advantage of the moment and hides Lwaxana in the laboratory to duplicate her telepathic abilities.

action.name: Save Your Lies For This Fool

crew_archetypes.name: Grilka
crew_archetypes.flavor: Grilka führte das Haus der Grilka an und heiratete Quark, um ihr Haus nach dem Tod ihres Ehemanns behalten zu dürfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Idrin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Idrin ist der Commander eines Hirogen-Jagdschiffs, der Tuvok und Seven of Nine gefangen nahm.

crew_archetypes.name: Dahj (aktiviert)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein weiblich aussehender Androide, der glaubte, ein Mensch zu sein. Er aktivierte seine Kampffähigkeiten während des Angriffs der Romulaner.

crew_archetypes.name: Dahj auf der Flucht
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dahjs Leben ist in Gefahr und ihre Welt liegt in Trümmern, weshalb sie Picard um Hilfe bittet.

action.name: Ein Feuergefecht noch etwas länger aushalten

crew_archetypes.name: Kova Tholl
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kova Tholl was kidnapped for a secret experiment to study how different races react to authority. The Mizarian chose to submit rather than create conflict.

crew_archetypes.name: Corporal D. Chang
crew_archetypes.flavor: During the mission, Chang was tasked with guarding a hatchery for Xindi insectoids.

crew_archetypes.name: Zarabeth
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ganz allein fünftausend Jahre in der Vergangenheit gefangen, verliebt sich Zarabeth in einen überraschenden Besucher: Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Shinzon
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Klon von Jean-Luc Picard. Shinzon befehligte das mächtige Kriegsschiff Scimitar gegen die USS Enterprise E.

crew_archetypes.name: Riaan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riaan runs a pharmacy and is also researching the mysterious illness that killed her brother.

action.name: People Are Dying And I Can't Determine Why

crew_archetypes.name: Gorn-Captain
crew_archetypes.flavor: Der Captain der Gorn, der für den Angriff auf Cestus III verantwortlich war, wurde von den Metronen gezwungen, gegen Kirk zu kämpfen.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Gorn
crew_archetypes.flavor: A hostile Gorn immediately attacks Spock, who has boarded the Cayuga ship.

crew_archetypes.name: Libby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kim's one-time lover, whom he awoke to find was his fiancée while living in an alternate reality.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok ist ein Ensign auf der USS Excelsior unter Captain Sulu und war bei der Rettung von James Kirk und Leonard McCoy dabei.

crew_archetypes.name: Sicherheitschef Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sicherheitschef für Captain Janeway und ein ehemaliger Infiltrator des Maquis-Schiffs Val Jean.

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvok (Maquis)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während einer Mission der Sternenflotte zur Infiltrierung des Maquis trat Tuvok Chakotays Besatzung und Zelle bei.

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvok (abgestürzt)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok stürzt mit einem Shuttle auf einem Mond ab und muss sich auch noch um drei verängstigte Kinder bei der Reparatur kümmern.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the Mirror Universe, Tuvok was a member of the Terran Rebellion, and used his species’ inherent logic to fight the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance.

action.name: Logic Dictates Caution In The Face Of A Superior Enemy

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: A rescued Captain Tuvok showed Seven her final review from Shaw before promoting her to captain.

crew_archetypes.name: Investigator Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: To aid Carol Freeman's investigation, Tuvok uses an invasive mind meld to uncover the truth behind the attack on Pakled.

crew_archetypes.name: Pastry Chef Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok's compromised state allowed him to become closer to Neelix and discover his pastry talent.

action.name: Would You Like Some Terra Nut Soufflé, Captain?

crew_archetypes.name: Stranded Tuvok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvok and Paris crash land on an unknown planet, where the alien Noss helps them survive.

action.name: Is There A Point To Your Pessimism?

crew_archetypes.name: Laura
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to a recessive gene mutation, Laura was able to maintain her individuality as a drone. She also helped other drones maintain their individuality.

crew_archetypes.name: Emil
crew_archetypes.flavor: An Emergency Medical Hologram and almost an exact copy of Rios. Emil is activated from time to time, not always at the right moment.

crew_archetypes.name: Duras, Son of Ja'rod
crew_archetypes.flavor: Duras inherited a lot from his father, including the ability to weave intrigue and frame others to maintain power.

crew_archetypes.name: Chefingenieur Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine halb-klingonische Maquis-Offizierin, die später der USS Voyager als Chefingenieurin beigetreten ist.

crew_archetypes.name: Torres (Maquis-Übernahme)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres führte unter der Kontrolle von Teero Anaydis eine Maquis-Revolte auf der USS Voyager an.

action.name: Mit roher Gewalt geht das nicht

crew_archetypes.name: Barge of the Dead Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: While unconscious, Torres finds her mother aboard the Barge of the Dead, bound for Gre’Thor, the realm of the Klingon afterlife meant for dishonored souls.

crew_archetypes.name: Orbital Skydiving Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: B'Elanna engages in increasingly risky behavior in the Holodeck while mourning the loss of her Maquis crewmates.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres appears at the luau in a tropical dress, and looks simply smashing.

action.name: Why Don't You Take a Break?

crew_archetypes.name: Caretaker Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres wakes up in a medical lab, where the Ocampan doctor informs her and Kim that he is protecting his population from 'their' disease.

action.name: I Don't Find This At All Amusing, Starfleet

crew_archetypes.name: Warship Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: This ruthless half-Klingon warrior is believed to have helped engineer some of Voyager’s deadliest weapons.

action.name: It's A Little Late To Be Having Second Thoughts

crew_archetypes.name: Short Fuse Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Torres' Klingon aggression sometimes comes in handy, such as when faced with a Malon who was sabotaging the ship and was not in the mood for negotiations.

action.name: Get The Hell Away From There, Now!

crew_archetypes.name: Space Stranded Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Finding herself in outer space, face-to-face with death, Torres was finally able to confess her feelings for Paris.

action.name: Welcome To The Worst Day Of My Life

crew_archetypes.name: Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gray ist nun ein unsichtbarer Teil von Adira und unterstützt sie.

crew_archetypes.name: Second Chance Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: Gray now has a new synthetic body of his own to finally interact with the Discovery crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Guardian Gray
crew_archetypes.flavor: After six months of separation, Gray appears as a Guardian at the ceremony of transferring the symbiont into Culber's body.

action.name: So real, wie du es dir wünschst

crew_archetypes.name: Min Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: It's a sad realization that your child and the wife holding a birthday cake for you are just a hologram.

crew_archetypes.name: Luisa Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Luisa participated in terraforming on the planet Velara III and called herself 'the gardener of Eden.'

action.name: Terraforming Makes You Feel Almost God-like
Alles, was ich sagte, war die Wahrheit!

crew_archetypes.name: Renegade Locarno
crew_archetypes.flavor: Locarno’s resentment for Starfleet grew so intense that he decided to organize his own rebel fleet.

action.name: I Could've Been The Best Pilot in Starfleet!

crew_archetypes.name: Crosis
crew_archetypes.flavor: An uncharacteristically individualistic Borg drone. Aboard the Enterprise, Crosis seeks to lure Data to Lore's side.

crew_archetypes.name: Mestral
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Vulkanier, der von den Menschen so fasziniert war, dass er sein Leben für sie riskierte. Letztendlich entschied er sich für ein Leben unter ihnen.

action.name: Ich bin bereit, das Risiko einzugehen.

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: A talented medic with a secret, M’Benga reunites with Pike when he serves aboard the Enterprise.

action.name: Somewhere Out There is the Discovery I Need

crew_archetypes.name: King Ridley
crew_archetypes.flavor: M’Benga finds himself cast as King Ridley, a hero in search of a precious artifact in his daughter’s favorite storybook.

crew_archetypes.name: Fly-Fishing M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: During his shore leave, M’Benga chose a quiet activity - fly-fishing.

crew_archetypes.name: M'Benga and Oriana
crew_archetypes.flavor: M'Benga helps Kirk execute their plan to lure out the Gorn, while also taking care of a Valeo Beta V castaway - a young girl named Oriana.

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'Bara M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: While sparring with Dak’Rah, M’Benga learns a lot about his opponent. But lingering anger from the war weaves its way into their match.

action.name: Are You Sure You're Up For Full Impact?

crew_archetypes.name: Broken Circle M'Benga
crew_archetypes.flavor: Starfleet receives a distress signal from the Cajitar system, and M’Benga and Chapel are sent there to observe the situation.

crew_archetypes.name: Laas
crew_archetypes.flavor: Laas, ein Wechselbalg aus dem Alpha-Quadranten, kann viele verschiedene Formen annehmen, auch die eines warpfähigen Lebewesens.

crew_archetypes.name: Barkeeper Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Besitzer von Quark's Bar. Er ist einer der vielseitigeren Bewohner auf Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Quark (Klingonen)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als ein Klingone in Quark's Bar stirbt, bringt dessen Witwe Grilka Quark nach Qo'noS.

action.name: Sie können keinen Berg mit Krümeln besteigen!

crew_archetypes.name: Quark (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark muss sich mit unzähligen Tribbles in seiner Bar rumschlagen.

action.name: Wir könnten eine andere Station bauen

crew_archetypes.name: Audrid Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark became a reluctant host to Audrid and his trepidation only increased when he found his personality at odds with hers.

action.name: The Entity That Lent Me This Body Wishes to Speak

crew_archetypes.name: People Person Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a bartender, Quark greatly enjoys interacting with his guests. He has a keen eye for when crew members act out of character.

action.name: Too Quiet. Something Is Terribly Wrong.

crew_archetypes.name: Bar Owner Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quark plunged headlong into business - and by 2381 he already had his own chain of bars 'Quark's Bar'.

crew_archetypes.name: Entrepreneur Quark
crew_archetypes.flavor: Never one to miss a business opportunity, Quark tries to make some quick latinum off an innocent Harry Kim.

crew_archetypes.name: Amanda Grayson (erwartend)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Amanda Spock gebeten hat, seinem Vater Sarek zu helfen, wartet sie ängstlich darauf, dass das Verfahren abgeschlossen wird.

crew_archetypes.name: Amanda Grayson (Abschlussklasse)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Burnhams Adoptivmutter unterstützte sie sie und erinnerte sie daran, ihre menschliche Seite zu bewahren.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Mark Jameson
crew_archetypes.flavor: Die Zeit holte Admiral Jameson ein, als er bei den Verhandlungen einer Geiselnahme Karnas zur Rede stellte.

action.name: Ich bin stark, wachsam und fit!

crew_archetypes.name: Aamin Marritza
crew_archetypes.flavor: Marritza posed as the brutal gul he served under, hoping his execution would compel Cardassia to reckon with its crimes.

action.name: Kill Me, Torture Me, It Doesn't Matter

crew_archetypes.name: Weyounklon 4
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Vorta-Klon, der ein Angriffsschiff der Jem'Hadar kommandierte. Er wurde später getötet, nachdem er einen Aufstand der Jem'Hadar niederschlug.

crew_archetypes.name: Kevin Mulkahey
crew_archetypes.flavor: In one of Sisko's visions, Mulkahey was a plainclothes police officer in 1950’s New York who abused his power to harass Benny Russell.

crew_archetypes.name: Alternate Reality Keras
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an alternate timeline, Gal Gath’thong that attacked the U.S.S. Enterprise and U.S.S. Farragut was under the command of Keras.

action.name: We Are Engaged In A Cease-fire

crew_archetypes.name: Techniker Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Der jüngere Bruder von Quark. Rom war ein erfolgreiches Mitglied der Ingenieurscrew auf Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Großer Nagus Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rom führte eine Reformationsbewegung unter den Ferengi an und wurde später in den Rang eines Großen Nagus erhoben.

crew_archetypes.name: Niners Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rom spielt als Pinch Hitter in Siskos Baseballteam für die Niners gegen die Logicians der Vulkanier.

crew_archetypes.name: Bruder Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Quarks jüngerer Bruder, der seit mehreren Jahren in seiner Bar arbeitet.

crew_archetypes.name: Innovator Rom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Grand Nagus Rom proves looks can be deceiving, leaving those who negotiate with him to wonder who's really in charge.

crew_archetypes.name: Katrot
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of the Betazoid spies who tried to get intelligence through telepathy and probably drank all the cocktails.

crew_archetypes.name: Tiron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tiron gives Quark generous financial incentive to get him a 'custom' holosuite program featuring Major Kira.

crew_archetypes.name: Anführerin Pav
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pav, die Anführerin der Trill-Regierung, stand Adiras Beziehung mit Tal skeptisch gegenüber.

crew_archetypes.name: Queen Paolana
crew_archetypes.flavor: Paolana was ready for any tricks to fix her son and force him to take the throne.

action.name: A Meager Price To Pay To Get You On The Throne

crew_archetypes.name: Will Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Erster Offizier der USS Enterprise D. William Riker hatte eine erfolgreiche Karriere bei der Sternenflotte.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Thomas Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thomas Riker wurde von William Riker bei einem Transporterunfall getrennt und blieb acht Jahre lang allein zurück.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: In seiner Freizeit vergnügt sich Commander Riker oft bei einem Pokerspiel mit seinen Brückenoffizieren.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Admiral Riker, Bestandteil des letzten Tests von Q für Picard, nutzte die Enterprise D, um einen Antizeit-Riss zu schließen.

crew_archetypes.name: Mintakaner-Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um die kulturelle Kontamination auf Mintaka einzudämmen, verkleidet sich Riker als mintakanischer Händler.

action.name: Wir sind auf eine Quantenanomalie getroffen

crew_archetypes.name: Riker (USS Zheng He)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker lässt ein genussvolles Leben mit Bunnicorn-Wurst-Pizza zeitweilig hinter sich und eilt mit der USS Zheng He Picard auf Coppelius zu Hilfe.

action.name: Ich habe von den Besten gelernt

crew_archetypes.name: Regent Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein ahnungsloser Riker wird plötzlich von Amanda Rogers' neu entdeckten Kräften von einem Date in Zehn Vorne in einen Garten geworfen, der wie ein Garten aus den Zeiten von Jane Austen aussieht.

crew_archetypes.name: Riker (Captain-Picard-Tag)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker macht seine beste Picard-Imitation, um den Captain auf die Schippe zu nehmen.

crew_archetypes.name: Worst Contact Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker and his team make first contact with a new civilization whose ways of showing respect are very peculiar.

crew_archetypes.name: Night Terrors Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker jumps out of bed and finds snakes wrapped around his leg. But a moment later they are no longer there - it was a hallucination.

action.name: I'd Be a Liar If I Said I Felt Like Myself

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: To defeat the Borg, you need to be quite risky and focused on your goal. Luckily, Riker is just that.

crew_archetypes.name: Groom Riker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Riker is on the verge of new frontiers - family life, command of a new ship, and new adventures lie ahead

crew_archetypes.name: Persis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Persis ist ein menschlicher Augment und entwickelte eine starke Beziehung zu Arik Soong, den sie als ihren Vater ansah.

crew_archetypes.name: Zorniger Khan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Khan wurde von Kirk auf Ceti Alpha V ausgesetzt und dürstet nun nach Rache für Admiral Kirks Nachlässigkeit.

crew_archetypes.name: Junger Khan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Herrscher über ein Viertel der Menschheit während der Eugenischen Kriege entkam Khan auf der SS Botany Bay.

crew_archetypes.name: Ceti Alpha V Khan
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Ceti Alpha V, Khan did everything to keep his people alive. With the raise of a hand, he immediately has his peoples’ ears - and their trust.

action.name: I Was a Prince... With Power Over Millions.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Khan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Khan’s genetic experiments were banned by the Terran Empire, but in doing so, was the Empire giving up a potential edge against its enemies?

action.name: Beware! I Am Fearless And Therefore Powerful.

crew_archetypes.name: Edith Keeler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Edith leitete eine Mission in New York. Kirk war gezwungen, sie bei einem Verkehrsunfall sterben zu lassen, um seine Zeitlinie zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Dak'Rah
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dak’Rah wanted to correct the mistakes of his past and became an ambassador to the Federation, but the past still followed him like a shadow.

action.name: But I've Been Doing The Best I Can

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Arav
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Osnullus science officer has remained with the USS Discovery across time and space, through thick and thin

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nicht ganz Spocks Frau und nicht ganz seine Verlobte, rief T'Pring das Kal-if-fee aus, um stattdessen mit Stonn zusammen zu sein.

crew_archetypes.name: T'Pring as Spock
crew_archetypes.flavor: Once in Spock's body, T'Pring is forced to do all his tasks, including negotiating with the R'ongovians, until the switch is undone.

crew_archetypes.name: V'Shal T'Pring
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Pring insisted on a V'Shal dinner and invited her parents to perform the engagement ceremony to change their attitude toward Spock.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Valeris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Spocks designierte Nachfolgerin Lieutenant Valeris besorgt Kirks Logbuch, damit es vor Gericht gegen ihn verwendet werden kann.

crew_archetypes.name: Jhamel
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jhamel ist eine Aenar und nutzt ihre telepathischen Kräfte in einer Telepräsenzeinheit, um ihren Bruder zu suchen und zu kontaktieren.

action.name: Ich werde meinen Bruder nicht im Stich lassen

crew_archetypes.name: One
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine Kombination aus Sevens Nanosonden und dem mobilen Emitter des Doktors wurde bei einer Borgdrohne aus dem 29. Jahrhundert durch einen Transporterunfall eingebunden.

crew_archetypes.name: Sandrine
crew_archetypes.flavor: The bar owner, an extravagant and loving woman, recreated in a holographic copy of Paris's favorite bar Chez Sandríne.

action.name: Oh, Stop Playing Games, Ma Cherie

crew_archetypes.name: Bytha
crew_archetypes.flavor: The daughter of the infamous Dak’Rah, she chose the path of vengeance, with M’Benga's death her ultimate goal.

action.name: There Was One Way To Restore Our Name

crew_archetypes.name: Socrates
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Teil des Persönlichkeitserweiterungsprogramms des Medizinischen Notfallholoprogramms, das zu unbeabsichtigten Resultaten führte.

action.name: Ich weiß, dass ich nichts weiß

crew_archetypes.name: Kov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kov served as an engineer aboard the Vahklas. He struggled with the decision to reconnect with his estranged, ailing father.

crew_archetypes.name: Kleg
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Ledosian flight instructor who taught Paris the rules of flying in Ledosian space.

action.name: All My Students Complete The Entire Course

crew_archetypes.name: Emotionally Heightened T'Lyn
crew_archetypes.flavor: T'Lyn, according to her colleagues, is too emotional for a Vulcan. Though her intuitive decisions were useful, she was still transferred to the Cerritos.

action.name: Logic Is The Beginning Of Wisdom, Not The End

crew_archetypes.name: Illogical T'Lyn
crew_archetypes.flavor: T’Lyn’s distress overrides her Vulcan emotional control. Unfortunately, this has a major impact on the ship's guests.

action.name: By The Transitive Property, I Too Must Be Vulcan As A Mother

crew_archetypes.name: Nancy Hedford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Originally sent to stop a war, Nancy instead found herself an unwitting player in an unrequited love story between a non-corporeal entity and a human, a story which put her very life at stake.

crew_archetypes.name: Richter Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Allmächtiger Richter und Geschworene in einem. Q hat die Besatzung der Enterprise-D bei Farpoint einer Prüfung unterzogen.

crew_archetypes.name: Menschlicher Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem ihm seine Macht durch das Q-Kontinuum genommen wurde, sucht Q Zuflucht auf der Enterprise D.

crew_archetypes.name: Q (Sheriff von Nottingham)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während seiner Robin-Hood-Simulation spielt Q den Sheriff von Nottingham.

action.name: Willkommen im Leben nach dem Tod
Es braucht nur ein paar gute Männer!

crew_archetypes.name: Q (Don Juan)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Von allen Frauen aller Spezies in der Galaxie sucht sich Q ausgerechnet Janeway aus, um mit ihr Elternschaft zu erleben.

crew_archetypes.name: Q (Archäologe)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q ködert Picard mit Reisen zu untergegangenen Zivilisationen, um Geschichte und Archäologie besser verstehen zu können.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the Delta Quadrant, Q searches for long lost knowledge - romantic advice from Kim and Paris.

crew_archetypes.name: Q (Union)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q bringt Janeway in das Q-Kontinuum, wo er den amerikanischen Bürgerkrieg nachstellt, um ihr zu erklären, warum sich das Kontinuum im Krieg mit sich selbst befindet.

crew_archetypes.name: Q (25. Jahrhundert)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q stattet Picard einen unerwarteten Besuch ab, der ihn einen neuen Kurs einschlagen lässt.

crew_archetypes.name: Dread Pirate Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q would be a tough pirate, wouldn't he? He’s had an eternity to build up an immunity to poisonous powders.

crew_archetypes.name: Chokuzan Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: After his son leaves Voyager for a joyride, Q takes on the guise of a Chokuzan to test Q Jr.

action.name: Well Done, Junior. I'm Proud Of You.

crew_archetypes.name: Jester Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Never before has a suit reflected one’s inner world so accurately.

crew_archetypes.name: Ultimate Test Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Q appearance is an expected challenge for modern Starfleet commanders, but Mariner shuts him down right away.

action.name: I Want To Put Humanity To The Ultimate Test.

crew_archetypes.name: Operations Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q wants to thank Picard for saving him at any cost. The fact that Picard isn't interested is of no consequence to Q.

action.name: Tell Me What Is It You Wish

crew_archetypes.name: Conquistador Q
crew_archetypes.flavor: Some say the Conquistadors were simply robbers, others that they were great conquerors. There's no doubt that both options suit Q.

crew_archetypes.name: Fred
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Soong-type Android over 600 years old, his keen interest in centuries-old artifacts places the Q’Mau fence in grave danger.

action.name: How Effervescent To Meet New Clients

crew_archetypes.name: Korath
crew_archetypes.flavor: When the inventor of the chronodeflector goes back on his deal with Janeway, she steals the device to bring Voyager home early.

action.name: You'll Pay For Your Deceit, Ghuy'cha!

crew_archetypes.name: Kashyk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Inspector Kashyk believed telepaths were dangerous so he became romantically involved with Janeway to suss them out on the Federation ship.

action.name: Trust Has To Be Earned. It's Gradual.

crew_archetypes.name: Botschafter V'Lar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Botschafterin V'Lar nutzt ihre Reise an Bord der Enterprise, um die Mazariten bloßzustellen.

crew_archetypes.name: Abtrünniger Harry Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Harry vor 15 Jahren die Voyager bei dem Versuch nach Hause zu gelangen verloren hatte, kann er die Vergangenheit verändern, um das Schiff zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Kim (Gefangener)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Insasse eines Gefängnisses der Akritirianer muss Kim drastische Maßnahmen ergreifen, um zu überleben.

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Kim (Fair Haven)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Harry Kim bereitet sich auf einen Abend mit Maggie vor. Dazu repliziert er einige Blumen und zieht einen schönen Anzug an.

crew_archetypes.name: Harry Kim (Alternative Version)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Kim von der ursprünglichen Voyager in einem Kampf gegen die Vidiianern getötet wird, schickt eine alternative Voyager ihren eigenen Kim zusammen mit Naomi Wildman zum ursprünglichen Schiff.

crew_archetypes.name: Caretaker Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kim wakes up in a medical facility with strange sores. He learns he and Torres are ill and could be dangerous to their respective crews.

crew_archetypes.name: Luau Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kim is interested in the holographic Marayna, so he comes to the Luau party. But he leaves after learning that Tuvok is also not indifferent to the hologram.

action.name: Listen, I'm Going Back To My Quarters

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Harry Kim
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Kim meets his other selves and is outraged that they are still ensigns. He believes the Kims will be better off in his reality.

crew_archetypes.name: Dexa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Auf einem abgelegenen Asteroiden lehnt sich Dexa mit anderen Talaxianern gegen Minenarbeiter auf, die ihre neue Heimat für Mineralien sprengen wollen.

action.name: Keine Sorge, es ist nichts Ernstes

crew_archetypes.name: Der Professor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Der Professor wurde vom Computer der Enterprise als ultimativer Gegner für Detektiv Data geschaffen.

crew_archetypes.name: Disorderly Icheb
crew_archetypes.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Icheb
crew_archetypes.flavor: Icheb was kidnapped during a reconnaissance mission and had his Borg components mercilessly ripped from his body.

crew_archetypes.name: Großer Nagus Zek
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Großer Nagus der Ferengi war Zek der Anführer der Ferengi-Regierung.

crew_archetypes.name: Wesley Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein junges Besatzungsmitglied der USS Enterprise D, der er später als Ensign beitreten würde.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem er den Aufnahmetest der Sternenflotte bestand, wurde Wesley Crusher in den Rang eines Ensigns befördert.

crew_archetypes.name: Diensthabender Ensign Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als er sich mit dem Reisenden angefreundet und diesen unterstützt hatte, erhielt Wesley Crusher eine Feldbeförderung zum aktiven Ensign.

crew_archetypes.name: Wesley Crusher (Formelle Kleidung)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wesley kehrte 2379 von seiner Reise mit dem Reisenden zurück, um an der Hochzeit von Troi und Riker teilzunehmen.

crew_archetypes.name: Kadett Wesley Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Wesley Crusher war drei Jahre ein Kadett der Sternenflotte und begleitete dann den Reisenden.

action.name: Die Sternenflotte ist nichts für mich

crew_archetypes.name: Wesley (Junge in Blau)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein zeitgemäß gekleidetes Holoprogramm von Wesley Crusher, der ein Picknick mit seiner Mutter genießt, bevor ein Kampf ausbricht.

crew_archetypes.name: Experienced Traveler Wesley
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having met Kore, Wesley offers her a choice - to stay where she is or become a Traveler like him.

action.name: So The Universe Is Essentially A Grand Tapestry

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilated Wesley
crew_archetypes.flavor: Anyone can fall under the influence of the Collective and lose their individuality.

crew_archetypes.name: Marlena Moreau (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Es dauerte nicht lange, bis klar wurde, dass Kirk aus einem anderen Universum stammte. Aber es war nicht einfach, ihn zurückzuschicken.

crew_archetypes.name: Marlena Moreau
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk met new Science Officer Marlena Moreau immediately after interacting with her mirror self. How similar could they be?

action.name: I Was Just Assigned Last Week

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Sonya Gomez
crew_archetypes.flavor: Being an attentive and insightful captain, Gomez, together with the crew of the Cerritos, successfully completes the first contact mission.

action.name: Take Us In, Nice And Slow

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Sonya Gomez
crew_archetypes.flavor: Extremely outgoing, curious, and eager, Sonya Gomez began her Starfleet career as an ensign on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D under La Forge.

action.name: Have I Been Talking Too Much?

crew_archetypes.name: Miral Torres
crew_archetypes.flavor: Miral erschien ihrer Tochter B'Elanna auf der Barke der Toten während einer Nahtoderfahrung.

crew_archetypes.name: Jenna Mitchell
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jenna Mitchell was assigned to the Enterprise as Operations Officer. Her professionalism and versatility has helped the crew on many occasions.

action.name: Ist sonst noch jemand auf diesem Schiff?

crew_archetypes.name: Luther Sloan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Agent im Geheimdienst Sektion 31. Er hat regelmäßig mit Julian Bashir zusammengearbeitet.

crew_archetypes.name: Syrran
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein vulkanischer Philosoph, der Archer und T'Pol durch den Glühofen führt.

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Grat
crew_archetypes.flavor: This Tandaran officer has no intention of letting Captain Archer leap away - not when he might have intel on the Cabal.

action.name: Your Curiosity Almost Got You Killed

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Clark Terrell
crew_archetypes.flavor: The captain of the USS Reliant. His mind was overtaken by Khan but with a loyalty so strong he took his own life to protect Kirk’s.

action.name: What Do You Want With Us?

crew_archetypes.name: Nausikaanischer Schläger
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of Nausicaan dom-jot players who stabbed Picard in the heart during a bar fight.

crew_archetypes.name: Melora Pazlar
crew_archetypes.flavor: One of the only handful of Elaysians to have left their homeworld, Melora wishes to explore the stars without giving up being herself.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Taurik
crew_archetypes.flavor: A witty and inquisitive Vulcan who befriended several ensigns. He was enthusiastic about his work with La Forge on the warp drive.

crew_archetypes.name: Rumpelstiltskin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Fairy-tale character who appeared on the ship to observe the unique phenomenon of imagination.

crew_archetypes.name: Gathorel Labin
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Sikarian magistrate who revels at the chance to host a “ship of aliens” and gain as much pleasure from their tales as his people can.

action.name: My Pleasure Will Be Greater Than Yours

crew_archetypes.name: Lore
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doktor Soongs erster Android mit einem funktionsfähigen positronischen Gehirn. Er besaß Emotionen und war Datas älterer Bruder.

crew_archetypes.name: Der Eine, Lore
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem er einen für Data bestimmten Emotionschip gestohlen hatte, wurde Lore der Anführer eines Borg-Schiffs.

crew_archetypes.name: Zyree
crew_archetypes.flavor: Zyree hilft den Ferengi beim Abschluss eines Geschäfts über eine enorme Menge Tulabeerenwein.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kruge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commander Kruge ist der klingonische Kommandant eines Bird-of-Prey, der das Genesis-Projektil als Waffe für die Klingonen einsetzen will.

crew_archetypes.name: Pregnant Eleen
crew_archetypes.flavor: The mother of the future heir, miraculously saved from execution. As regent, her first priority was to improve her people's relationship with the Federation.

action.name: I Was Proud To Obey The Laws

crew_archetypes.name: J'Vini
crew_archetypes.flavor: For a Qalankhkai, an oath is an unbreakable promise until it is fulfilled. Not even Starfleet officers can stop J'Vini in her mission.

action.name: Come After Me And Your Lives Are Forfeit
Wir sind weit entfernt von Daheim
Die Sternenflotte hat diesen Krieg nicht begonnen
Lieber ihre Welt als die unsere

crew_archetypes.name: Fascination Lwaxana Troi
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lwaxana’s mere presence at the Bajoran Gratitude Festival was enough for everyone around her to begin to open up about their secret feelings.

action.name: I Came To See You, You Poor Sweet Tortured Man

crew_archetypes.name: Shiboline M'Ress
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als natürliche Kommunikatorin arbeitete M'ress als zweite Kommunikationsoffizierin unter Captain Kirk.

action.name: Er tritt auf wie ein Mann

crew_archetypes.name: Carlos Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lieutenant Data übernimmt in einem von Picards Dixon-Hill-Holoromanen die Rolle von Carlos.

crew_archetypes.name: Data (Nemesis-Opfer)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Er opfert sich, um Captain Picard und die Besatzung der USS Enterprise-E im Kampf gegen Praetor Shinzon zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Musketier Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein holografischer Musketier erscheint mit Datas Antlitz, um Barclay zu bekämpfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Data (Croupier)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dank seiner Kenntnisse in Statistik und Wahrscheinlichkeitsrechnung sollte Data jeden Spieler der Sternenflotte schlagen können. Wenn er nur ihre Mimik deuten könnte.

action.name: Nennt man so etwas ein Pokerface?

crew_archetypes.name: Data (Professor)
crew_archetypes.flavor: In dieser alternativen Zukunft bekleidet Data den Lucasischen Lehrstuhl für Mathematik an der Universität Cambridge.

action.name: Wir werden Sache auf den Grund gehen

crew_archetypes.name: Hollow Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data’s encounter with Tam Elbrun and Gomtuu teaches him about the human desire to belong somewhere.

crew_archetypes.name: Data and Spot
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data loves his cat Spot so much, he even wrote an “Ode to Spot”!

action.name: Oh, Spot, The Complex Levels of Behavior You Display!

crew_archetypes.name: First Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data rises up to First Officer as a replacement for Riker after a rather uptight captain took over the Enterprise in Picard’s absence.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: In honor of Riker's and Deanna's “conjugation” Data took the stage and gave a performance that blew everybody away.

action.name: Oh, Blue Skies, Smiling at Meeee

crew_archetypes.name: Phantasms Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data's dream system malfunctions and he becomes a prisoner of repeating and worsening nightmares.

action.name: Have You Ever Had A Nightmare?

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Officer Data
crew_archetypes.flavor: Data reclaims his seat on the Enterprise-D bridge, but could something grander be in store for the fleet's first acting android captain?

crew_archetypes.name: Data as Masaka
crew_archetypes.flavor: After happening upon a comet, Data begins taking on the personality of an entity calling itself Masaka.

crew_archetypes.name: Varria
crew_archetypes.flavor: Varria was Fajo's loyal assistant, despite his immorality. But realizing he did not value her, she was not afraid to turn on him.

crew_archetypes.name: Becky Freeman
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s impossible to imagine Mariner as a strict and disciplinarian captain. However, in an alternate universe, she is.

action.name: A Captain Has To Maintain Discipline Above All Else

crew_archetypes.name: Nilz Baris
crew_archetypes.flavor: Baris really wanted to arrest Kirk for wasting grain, but thanks to tribbles he got the opportunity to arrest the one who poisoned the grain.

action.name: Now, I Want You To Keep That Grain Safe

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Jennifer Sh'reyan
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

crew_archetypes.name: Zhaban
crew_archetypes.flavor: A former Tal Shiar agent, Zhaban is now a housekeeper for Picard, and his wisdom may be the greatest thing he can offer the former officer.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Jack Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Mitglied der Crew der USS Stargazer wird Lieutenant Commander Crusher bei einer Außenmission getötet.

crew_archetypes.name: Vox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to his father, Jack Crusher was able to free himself from the Collective and escape.

action.name: The Time Of The Borg Is Over!

crew_archetypes.name: Rogue Jack Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: The son of two Starfleet veterans, Jack chose a different path. He conducts criminal activities and is wanted under various aliases.

crew_archetypes.name: Counselor Jack Crusher
crew_archetypes.flavor: Jack Crusher was able to find his way after all. As a special counselor to Seven, he began his new life.

action.name: No, No, I Am Not Alone

crew_archetypes.name: Dolorex
crew_archetypes.flavor: This buzzkill Betazoid spy was intent to use her Betazoid telepathy to obtain the intelligence she so desperately sought.

crew_archetypes.name: Prinzessin Tonia Barrows
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während Barrows mit McCoy auf Landurlaub ist, stellt sie sich vor, ein märchenhaftes Prinzessinnenkleid zu tragen, woraufhin es sich sofort materialisiert.

crew_archetypes.name: Yeoman Barrows
crew_archetypes.flavor: Yeoman Barrows was one of the members of a group that became trapped on the shore leave planet.

action.name: It Is Beautiful. So Lovely, And Restful

crew_archetypes.name: Gilora Rejal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Mitglied des cardassianischen Wissenschaftsministeriums hilft Gilora Rejal beim Entwurf eines Subraum-Relais im Gamma-Quadranten.

action.name: Ich habe keine Angst, ich bin nur müde

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Richard Daystrom
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doktor Daystrom, einer der größten Wissenschaftler der Erde, entwickelte den M-5-Computer, um Raumschiffe automatisch steuern zu lassen.

crew_archetypes.name: Doopler Emissary
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a trade emissary, this Doopler must keep his social anxiety under control to prevent dangerous exponential dooplercation.

crew_archetypes.name: Krem
crew_archetypes.flavor: Krem is not the smartest of the pirate crew, and his Ferengi lobes don’t help when it comes to Archer's manipulation tactics.

action.name: I Don't The Have Lobes For Business

crew_archetypes.name: Ilia-Sonde
crew_archetypes.flavor: Originally a crew member of the Enterprise-A, Ilia was destroyed and recreated as a probe by the entity V'Ger.

action.name: Du hast mich im Stich gelassen

crew_archetypes.name: Assistant Kes
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kes is really interested in the Doctor's experiment with his holographic family. Therefore, she gladly helps him and even agrees to come to dinner to meet the Doctor's family.

action.name: Es steht zu viel auf dem Spiel
Lassen Sie mich Ihnen zeigen, was geschehen wird

crew_archetypes.name: General Oh
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Oh von der Heimatwelt der Androiden erfährt, legt sie ihre Sternenflottenverkleidung ab und gibt der romulanischen Flotte den Befehl, sie auszulöschen.

action.name: Unser großes Werk ist nahezu vollbracht

crew_archetypes.name: Erster Maje Haron
crew_archetypes.flavor: Haron war der Anführer der Kazon-Relora-Sekte und wurde getötet, als Maje Culluh in ins All beamte.

crew_archetypes.name: Outpost Vina
crew_archetypes.flavor: The sole survivor of a survey ship crash on Talos IV, Vina helps the Keeper lure Pike into the Menagerie.

crew_archetypes.name: Picnic Vina
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vina, who preferred to live in an illusion rather than return to Earth, tries to convince Pike to stay with her on the Talos at an illusion picnic.

crew_archetypes.name: Axum
crew_archetypes.flavor: With the help of the Voyager crew, Axum set the Unimatrix Zero drones free, and became leader of the resistance movement against the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Patar
crew_archetypes.flavor: Patar war der Ansicht, dass eine künstliche Intelligenz bessere Entscheidungen treffen kann, um künftige Bedrohungen zu vermeiden.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven in Blau
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach ihrer Trennung vom Borg-Kollektiv hat sich Seven of Nine, jetzt Seven, sehr angestrengt, um sich anzupassen.

crew_archetypes.name: Zeitagent Seven of Nine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein Besatzungsmitglied auf dem Zeitschiff Relativity. Sie wurde später von Seven of Nine ersetzt.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven of Nine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Trotz ihrer Vergangenheit hat sich Seven of Nine als furchtlose Offizierin erwiesen, die die USS Voyager bis zum Tod verteidigen würde.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven of Nine (Drohne)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Annika Hansen gemeinsam mit ihrer Familie assimiliert worden war, wurde sie zur B-Drohne Seven of Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Gutmütige Seven
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um den Doktor vor den Lokirrim zu verstecken, lädt Seven sein Programm in ihre kybernetische Matrix.

action.name: Ich bin sicher, Sie werden sich anpassen

crew_archetypes.name: Seven, die Borg-Königin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seven of Nine ergreift extreme Maßnahmen, um Picard und Soji zu schützen, indem sie die Königin des Artefakts wird.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven In Command
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to her knowledge of the Borg, Seven takes the captain's chair of the Stargazer and leads the field mission.

crew_archetypes.name: Seven, Son of K'Vok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seven manifests the personalities of assimilated individuals. One of them - the Klingon son of K’vok - emerges as she works with Torres.

crew_archetypes.name: Social Immersion Seven
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seven decided to create her own holoprogram where she was a human - with her successes, victories and weaknesses.

action.name: The Past Few Days Have Been Memorable
Können Sie sich an irgendetwas erinnern?

crew_archetypes.name: Keevan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Keevan überlebte einen Absturz und schickte seine Jem'Hadar in den Tod, um sich dann Captain Sisko zu ergeben.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Detmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: With a promotion and a new implant, Detmer is ready to face the trials and adventures the future holds for her.

crew_archetypes.name: Away Team Detmer
crew_archetypes.flavor: Detmer takes part in an away mission to a dead planet to stop its destruction.

action.name: There's No Reason I Should Be Fine

crew_archetypes.name: Chefingenieur La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi La Forge war Chefingenieur der Enterprise-D und ein wichtiges und talentiertes Mitglied der Crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach einem Kampf mit den Borg wurde Geordi mit der Enterprise-E ins Jahr 2063 versetzt.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi versuchte als Captain der USS Challenger Kim und Chakotay daran zu hindern, die Vergangenheit zu verändern, um die Voyager zu retten.

crew_archetypes.name: Surata IV La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi uses himself as bait with some hostile vines, knowing he can count on Data’s quick android reflexes.

crew_archetypes.name: All Good Things La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Due to Q's time rips, La Forge and Picard meet in the future, and La Forge helps the Captain get to the Neutral Zone to close the rifts.

action.name: I'm Trying, But There's a Lot of Interference

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: Geordi’s secret restoration project becomes a key point of resistance against the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: La Forge has quite a fun time at Troi and Riker's wedding, even managing to learn a little more about Guinan's personal life.

action.name: Did You Ever Think About Getting Married Again?

crew_archetypes.name: CMO Elizabeth Lense
crew_archetypes.flavor: Elizabeth took an assignment as the Lexington’s chief medical officer right after graduation, but sometimes regretted that she was not on Deep Space 9.

action.name: There Were Times I Regretted Not Taking Your Assignment.

crew_archetypes.name: Kore
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kore’s world is shattered when she learns she is not Dr. Adam Soong’s daughter, but one in a series of clones he created.

crew_archetypes.name: Susan Khouri
crew_archetypes.flavor: Caring for a baby binary clone forced Terra Prime member Susan to change her ways and sacrifice herself to tell T’Pol and Tucker.

action.name: They're Going To Kill Her. Don't Let Them.

crew_archetypes.name: Regency Rogers
crew_archetypes.flavor: Giving in to her feelings for Riker, Amanda Rogers transports herself and Riker into a dreamy romantic scene.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Maddox
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bruce Maddox versuchte als Experte der Sternenflotte für Kybernetik, Data für Studienzwecke zu demontieren.

crew_archetypes.name: Bruce Maddox
crew_archetypes.flavor: In pursuit of the truth, Maddox finds himself hunted by the Tal Shiar and chained by debt. His life on the run may be in greater danger than he realizes.

action.name: Eher sterbe ich, als dass ich fortgehe

crew_archetypes.name: Captain D'Chok
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain D’Chok leads with classic Klingon resolve, facing off with Spock to uncover a false-flag conspiracy.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain William Boimler
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rescuing yet another Harry Kim further drains any excitement for this multiverse mission that William had.

action.name: That's All The Multiverse Is! Just Lazy Derivative Remixes!

crew_archetypes.name: Bionic 5 Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford is cast in Mariner’s holonovel “Crisis Point” as Vindicta’s cyborg henchman, Bionic 5.

action.name: Tremble At The Sight Of The Great Vindicta!

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford uses his custom holodeck program to help Tendi learn how to spacewalk. Lessons were learned.

crew_archetypes.name: Chief Engineer Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: During a drill, Rutherford’s attempt at an iconic heroic sacrifice is foiled by the mundane reality of pain.

action.name: I Have To, Son. I Am Chief Engineer.

crew_archetypes.name: Cadet Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Rutherford wasn’t always so earnest. As a cadet, he broke rules and caused chaos. But could there be a sinister cause behind his change?

crew_archetypes.name: Anbo-jyutsu Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: Secret training with Boimler does not produce any results - they still lose in a two-on-one match with Mariner. Again.

action.name: Hopefully We Picked Up A Few Of Your Moves

crew_archetypes.name: Dragon's Breath Rutherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Hysperians would certainly be delighted if the talented Rutherford was one of them. How does this armor suit him!

crew_archetypes.name: Peak Efficiency Otherford
crew_archetypes.flavor: An alternate version of Rutherford - more mechanical, more focused on work, and with no memories of his past.

action.name: It Is Time To Make Some Memories

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis Mayweather war Steuermann der NX-01 Enterprise und erkundete an der Seite von Captain Archer neue Welten.

crew_archetypes.name: Weltraumnomade Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis Mayweather war einer der ersten Weltraumnomaden. So werden Personen bezeichnet, die auf Raumschiffen zur Welt kommen.

crew_archetypes.name: Tuskegee Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuskegee Mayweather wurde inspiriert von den Holodeck-Abenteuern von O'Brien und Bashir und spielte in der Zweiten Schlacht um New York mit.

action.name: Wenn es einfach ist, wo ist dann das Problem?

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather (MACO, taktisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem er der persönliche Leibwächter von Archer wurde, entschloss sich Mayweather dazu, die Befehle von Admiral Forrest zu missachten.

crew_archetypes.name: Mayweather (Raumanzug)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Mayweather und Reed haben während einer Außenmission auf einem Kometen jede Menge Spaß mit Schnee.

crew_archetypes.name: Abducted Travis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis was found tied to a repair station. It seems he is dead, but there is still a chance to save him.

crew_archetypes.name: Weightlifter Travis
crew_archetypes.flavor: Travis learned long ago the pain of training could help drown out romantic temptation, but there may be more at play here than he realizes.

action.name: Get Them Out Of My Head! The Pain Helps.

crew_archetypes.name: Pick-up Game Mayweather
crew_archetypes.flavor: Space missions are important, but one also needs to make time for a good game with friends.

crew_archetypes.name: Marla McGivers
crew_archetypes.flavor: Marla, die Historikerin der Enterprise, schließt sich Khan an und folgt ihm ins Exil auf Ceti Alpha V.

crew_archetypes.name: Solkar
crew_archetypes.flavor: The first (officially recorded) contact between Vulcans and Humans was the moment this Vulcan met the human Zephram Cochrane.

crew_archetypes.name: Lieutenant Commander Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Erster Wissenschaftsoffizier der USS Shenzhou.

action.name: Ich habe Hoffnung in den Sternen gesehen

crew_archetypes.name: Saru (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Sklave kümmert sich der zuvor namenlose Kelpianer um Captain Burnham.

crew_archetypes.name: Saru (menschlich)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein fehlerhaftes Holoprogramm an Bord des Wracks der KSF Khi'eth ließ Saru als Mensch erscheinen.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain Saru bittet seine Erste Offizierin Tilly um Empfehlungen für prägnante Sprüche.

crew_archetypes.name: Wiederkehrender Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Saru verlässt Kaminar und lehnt einen Posten als Captain ab, um die Discovery mit seinem Wissen und seiner Tatkraft zu unterstützen.

crew_archetypes.name: Elder Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: On Kaminar, Saru helps his people ensure that Su’Kal is not a threat, and is also encouraged to share his knowledge with the rest of the world.

action.name: We Live Now, Together, In Communion

crew_archetypes.name: Ambassador Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Though an ambassador, Saru can't leave the action side of Starfleet completely - thus he takes part in a mission to stop Tahal.

action.name: We Can Face That Struggle Together

crew_archetypes.name: Romantic Saru
crew_archetypes.flavor: Saru gives a bouquet to his beloved - as a sign of his sincere feelings and with the desire to please her and distract her from worry.

action.name: I Bring These As A Gift From The Planet Elpanah.

crew_archetypes.name: Cutler (Forscher)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Entomologin war Cutlers Fachwissen auf der Oberfläche des Planeten, der als Archer IV bekannt werden sollte, sehr gefragt.

action.name: Danke, dass du mich für diese Mission ausgewählt hast

crew_archetypes.name: Arachnia-Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als der Königin des Spinnenvolkes in Captain Protons Holoroman will Janeway Doktor Chaotica besiegen.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach ihrer Rückkehr aus dem Delta-Quadranten wurde Janeway innerhalb von zwei Jahren zum Vizeadmiral befördert.

action.name: Da ist Kaffee in diesem Nebel!

crew_archetypes.name: Assimilierte Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain Janeway ließ sich teilweise assimilieren, um die Borg mit einem Nanovirus zu infizieren.

action.name: Da ist wohl jemand über dein Grab gelaufen
Leider bin ich für Drohungen nicht sehr empfänglich

crew_archetypes.name: Janeway (polarisch)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Janeway gemeinsam mit Paris in eine Temporale Anomalie gesogen wurde, versucht sie nun, einen Planeten vor den Rettungsversuchen ihres Teams zu schützen.

crew_archetypes.name: Disguised Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Janeway and the away team blend into 20th century Los Angeles to pinpoint the location of Captain Braxton.

crew_archetypes.name: Puppy-Placated Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: With Q’s persistent attempts to pursue Janeway romantically, he aims to win her heart by sharing his vulnerability, and a puppy.

crew_archetypes.name: C.O.P. Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: After guiding Voyager through seven years in the Delta Quadrant, lighting the way for the Federation's predecessor should be a simple matter.

action.name: If the Coalition of Planets Needs Us, We Are Here to Help

crew_archetypes.name: Tearful Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Some decisions are too difficult. And despite looking stern during the separation process, Janeway can barely contain her emotions afterward.

crew_archetypes.name: Concerning Flight Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: In the holodeck, Janeway and Da Vinci hide from their pursuers in the wilderness, where they manage to fly on the Great Bird.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Jenkins
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain Jenkins - she may look like Captain Janeway, but could anyone mistake the cruel, heartless villain of the Doctor's novel for the real deal?

action.name: Nice Speech. Now Decompile The Program.

crew_archetypes.name: Katie O'Clare
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kate falls in love with the Irish bartender. But Janeway must come to terms with the fact he is no more real than the Katie role she plays.

crew_archetypes.name: New Earth Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: Terminally ill, Janeway and Chakotay are left on a planet they called New Earth, while the Voyager crew is trying to find a cure for their condition.

action.name: Someday I May Have To Let Go

crew_archetypes.name: Ralkana Janeway
crew_archetypes.flavor: To free the captured crew members, Janeway plays along with a crazed resistance soldier, pretending she is his daughter, Ralkana.

action.name: Maybe We'll Have To Try A Different Strategy

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander Michael Eddington
crew_archetypes.flavor: Before defecting to the Maquis, Michael Eddington had aspirations of climbing the ranks of Starfleet and eventually served on Deep Space Nine.

action.name: Well, I Am Here To Make Friends

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. JG Ayala
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ayala was forced to join the Voyager crew, where he now held the provisional rank of Lieutenant JG.

action.name: Wie kann ich Ihnen behilflich sein?

crew_archetypes.name: Young Roger Korby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Korby arrived at the U.S.S. Enterprise for the Federation Day celebrations and, unfortunately, infuriated Trelane with his perfection.

action.name: I'm Here. I Am Here. And I Have The Cakes.

crew_archetypes.name: Chefgärtner Boothby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Boothby war der Gärtner der Sternenflottenakademie und wurde von Generationen von Kadetten um Rat gefragt.

action.name: Der wahre Jakob ist nur hier.

crew_archetypes.name: Devor
crew_archetypes.flavor: A mercenary who boarded Enterprise-D planning to use preparations for a baryon sweep as cover to steal trilithium resin.

action.name: You're Starfleet. You Won't Kill Me

crew_archetypes.name: Lursa Duras
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lursa war die ältere der Duras-Schwestern und wollte das Klingonische Reich unter die Führung ihrer Familie bringen.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Barak
crew_archetypes.flavor: Captain des K'tinga-Klasse-Schiffs IKS Amar. Barak und seine Schiff wurden von V'ger vernichtet.

crew_archetypes.name: Vic Fontaine
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vic ist ein Hologramm, das sich seiner selbst bewusst ist, und im auf DS9 sehr beliebten "Vic's Las Vegas Lounge"-Holoprogramm vorkommt.

action.name: Wir sehen uns in der Hölle!

crew_archetypes.name: Sicherheitschef Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sicherheitschef der USS Enterprise D. Er war der erste Klingone, der die Sternflottenakademie absolvierte.

crew_archetypes.name: Defiant-Commander Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commander der USS Defiant, ein Kriegsschiff, das bereits gegen das Dominion und die Borg im Einsatz war.

crew_archetypes.name: Bürgerkriegs-Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um das Reich in einem Bürgerkrieg zu verteidigen, kämpft Worf an der Seite von Gowron und verwirkt somit seine Beförderung innerhalb der Sternenflotte.

crew_archetypes.name: Regent Worf (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Der brutale Herrscher der Klingonisch-Cardassianischen Allianz in einem Spiegeluniversum.

crew_archetypes.name: Will Scarlett
crew_archetypes.flavor: Worf wurde von Q gezwungen, in dessen Robin-Hood-Scenario den Will Scarlett zu mimen, worüber er gar nicht erfreut war.

crew_archetypes.name: Duchamps
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach einem Transporterunfall wird Worfs Bild von einem Holosuite-Programm benutzt, um eine Doktor Noahs Handlanger darzustellen.

crew_archetypes.name: Colonel Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Colonel Worf vertrat als angesehener Anwalt Kirk und McCoy beim Prozess auf Qo'noS.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf (Raumanzug)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nachdem Hawk assimiliert wurde, griff Worf ein, um Picard zu retten und die Borg-Bake zu zerstören.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf (Hebamme)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während eines schiffsweiten Notfalls hilft Worf Keiko O'Brien bei der Geburt in Zehn Vorne.

crew_archetypes.name: Willie Hawkins
crew_archetypes.flavor: A famous baseball player and friend of Benny Russell who also flirts with Cassie during Sisko’s vision.

crew_archetypes.name: Worf (Kal'Hyah)
crew_archetypes.flavor: In Vorbereitung auf seine Hochzeit mit Jadzia unterziehen sich Worf und seine Freunde den Prüfungen des Kal'Hyah.

action.name: Wir müssen das Beste daraus machen

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'bara Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Worf teaches Jaxa using a fake advancement test he calls a gik’tail to encourage her to speak up.

crew_archetypes.name: Handler Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Worf, son of Mogh, of the Houses of Martok and Rhozhenko, bane of the Duras family and slayer of Gowron, breaks his commitment to pacifism to save Raffi.

action.name: I Told You, Do Not Engage

crew_archetypes.name: Bridge Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: A warrior from birth, Worf gives it his all in the final battle with the Borg.

crew_archetypes.name: Dress Uniform Worf
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having to put on a dress uniform certainly doesn't make Worf happy. However, for the sake of a good roast, he endures it.

action.name: I Am Happy To Bring More Food

crew_archetypes.name: Gorgan
crew_archetypes.flavor: Evil in its purest form, Gorgan manipulated children to gain mind control over people.

crew_archetypes.name: Befehlshaber der Cabal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Da der Befehlshaber der Cabal nicht physisch in Erscheinung treten kann, versucht er aus dem 28. Jahrhundert die Geschehnisse zu manipulieren.

crew_archetypes.name: Deela
crew_archetypes.flavor: Deela is queen of the Scalosians. She falls for Kirk and, due to Scalosian male infertility, seeks to use the male crew of the Enterprise to continue their species.

action.name: We Move In The Wink Of An Eye

crew_archetypes.name: Tuvix
crew_archetypes.flavor: Tuvix entstand durch einen Transporterunfall und wurde wieder in Tuvok und Neelix aufgeteilt.

crew_archetypes.name: Charlene
crew_archetypes.flavor: The Doctor’s holographic wife with whom he explored what it might be like to be a working father.

action.name: Line Up Next To The Door, Children

crew_archetypes.name: Pascal Fullerton
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Präsident der Essentialisten-Bewegung ist Pascal entschlossen, die "moralischen Traditionen" der Föderation wiederherzustellen.

crew_archetypes.name: General Garkog
crew_archetypes.flavor: General Garkog intends to ruthlessly destroy the “source of [their] dishonor” - the field of uncertainty that makes him sing and dance.

action.name: Make No Attempt To Stop Us

crew_archetypes.name: John Frederick Paxton
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Anführer der xenophoben Terra Prime hat Paxton die Orpheus-Bergbauanlage in eine Waffe verwandelt, um alle Außerirdischen aus dem Sol-System zu vertreiben.

crew_archetypes.name: Lenore Karidian
crew_archetypes.flavor: A charming actress, she infiltrated the Enterprise, offering to put on a performance of Hamlet in order to kill anyone who knew of her father’s brutal past.

action.name: I Didn't Think We'd Be Meeting Again So Soon

crew_archetypes.name: Adam
crew_archetypes.flavor: Adam gehört zu einer Gruppe, die den Planeten Eden sucht und versucht mit Liedern, andere ebenfalls dazu zu bringen.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Diatta Ndoye
crew_archetypes.flavor: As a captain in the United Earth Force, Ndoye seems reluctant on diplomacy and more inclined to fire torpedoes. Maybe Saru will teach her a valuable lesson.

crew_archetypes.name: Kadett Sito Jaxa
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Mitglied des Nova-Geschwaders überlebt Sito Jaxa einen Flugunfall, bei dem ein anderer Kadett stirbt.

crew_archetypes.name: Mok'bara Sito Jaxa
crew_archetypes.flavor: As part of the “ancient ritual” of the gik'tal, Jaxa must defend herself against an opponent while blindfolded.

crew_archetypes.name: Gaila
crew_archetypes.flavor: Thanks to Quark, his fortunes faded, but that doesn't deter him from joining a mission to rescue Ishka, even if it's under a dubious promise for riches.

action.name: I'm A Weapons Dealer, Not A Soldier!

crew_archetypes.name: Vaatrik Pallra
crew_archetypes.flavor: The widow of a husband with a dark past, Pallra tried to lure out his collaborators in order to blackmail them for money.

action.name: May I Be Honest With You?

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Carol Marcus
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als führende Wissenschaftlerin des Genesis-Projekts verfolgte Doktor Marcus den Traum, Leben aus der Leblosigkeit zu erschaffen.

crew_archetypes.name: Lara
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lara, die für die Mission ausgewählt wurde, die gestohlene Großseele der Skorr zu finden, war eine Jägerin, die für ihren ausgezeichneten Orientierungssinn bekannt war.

crew_archetypes.name: Punker
crew_archetypes.flavor: Dieser Typ hört nervtötend laut Musik im Bus, bis Spock dem ein Ende bereitet.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Ro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ro Laren ist eine eigensinnige und stolze Bajoranerin, die Captain Picard und seiner Crew dabei half, eine Terrorgruppe zu fassen.

crew_archetypes.name: Maquis Ro Laren
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ro Laren wurde geschickt, um eine Zelle des Maquis zu infiltrieren. Stattdessen schließt sie sich dem Kampf gegen die Cardassianer an.

crew_archetypes.name: Insider Ro
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ro was recruited by Starfleet Intelligence, where she underwent intensive rehabilitation.

action.name: Blind Faith In Any Institution Does Not Make One Honorable

crew_archetypes.name: Doctor Vellek
crew_archetypes.flavor: An outstanding scientist of his time. His worst fears were realized when his notes on the Progenitors fell into the wrong hands.

action.name: This Power Cannot Fall Into The Wrong Hands

crew_archetypes.name: John Doe
crew_archetypes.flavor: Doe, an evolved Zalkonian, was persecuted by his planet’s authorities for his unique nature and forced to flee.

action.name: I Can Feel The Life Returning To My Body

crew_archetypes.name: Botanikerin Keiko
crew_archetypes.flavor: Keiko ist eine Botanikerin und war Leiterin des biologischen Pflanzenlabors der Enterprise. Später eröffnete sie eine Schule auf Deep Space 9.

crew_archetypes.name: Wixiban
crew_archetypes.flavor: Neelix’s former associate whose reappearance threatens to take him down a dark path.

action.name: You're Living In A Dream World. It's Time To Wake Up.

crew_archetypes.name: Wedding Planner Trelane
crew_archetypes.flavor: Q's young son as a wedding planner? That sounds alarming.

action.name: What About Fusion Style? I Call This 'Hu-Can.' Or 'Vul-Man.'

crew_archetypes.name: Dr. Tolian Soran
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Überlebender der Zerstörung von El-Auria durch die Borg will Soran unbedingt wieder in den Nexus zurückkehren.

crew_archetypes.name: Lt. Commander MacDougal
crew_archetypes.flavor: Lt. Commander MacDougal rushes to restore control of the ship after the Polywater Virus wreaks havoc on its crew.

crew_archetypes.name: Hanok
crew_archetypes.flavor: The trade minister of Karemma, Hanok, arrived on U.S.S. Defiant to resolve a trade dispute between the Karemma and the Ferengi.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als zweiter Captain der Constitution-Klasse Enterprise ist Captain Pike bekannt für seine Mission nach Talos IV.

action.name: Dies ist nicht das einzige Leben
Sie hatten recht, was uns betraf

crew_archetypes.name: Pike (Boreth)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Auf der Suche nach einer Energiequelle für den Anzug des Roten Engels sucht Pike auf Boreth nach Antworten.

crew_archetypes.name: Enterprise Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike resumes his tenure as Captain of the Enterprise, despite knowing where his career will lead him

action.name: The Future Is What We Make It

crew_archetypes.name: Kiley Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike goes undercover on Kiley 279 to avert a nuclear conflict that should never have been made possible in the first place

crew_archetypes.name: Chef Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Intelligent, charismatic, handsome, and now he cooks?!! Is there anything Pike can’t do!?

action.name: Sometimes Things Go So Badly, You Just Have to Laugh

crew_archetypes.name: Amand Rauth Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Amand Rauth’s deferential demeanor was a thin veil for a truly treacherous nature that even Captain Pike’s charisma couldn’t hide.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike ends up in an alternate timeline where he escaped injury and became an admiral. But is it worth the sacrifices of millions of people and his loved ones?

crew_archetypes.name: Kalar Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Arriving on Kalar, Pike and his landing party discover that they are losing their memories.

action.name: I Need Our Memories To Come Back

crew_archetypes.name: Orion Hurricane Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike realizes his birthday might be better spent with friends and decides to enjoy his own surprise party.

action.name: Maybe I Should Celebrate With My Friends

crew_archetypes.name: Subspace Rhapsody Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Stuck to an improbability field, Pike and his crew find themselves in a musical reality where heightened emotions make them break into song.

crew_archetypes.name: Mirror Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Intent on being more than just a pretty face, Pike proved himself just as brutal as any other mirror denizen, including in how he took command of the ISS Enterprise.

crew_archetypes.name: Indomitable Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike finds himself trapped in Talosian illusions. He manages to find a way out - the Talosians are powerless in the face of unpredictability and emotionality.

action.name: There's A Way Out Of Any Cage, And I'll Find It!

crew_archetypes.name: Valeo Beta V Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike and his team head to Valeo Beta V, where they first find the lost crew of the U.S.S. Peregrine, and then the cause of their death - the Gorn.

action.name: Let's Make It Quick And Careful

crew_archetypes.name: Gorn Offensive Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Pike leads the Enterprise and her crew on an offensive to push the Gorn back into their own space and halt their advancement into Federation territory.

crew_archetypes.name: Picnic Pike
crew_archetypes.flavor: Even the illusion of home couldn't make Pike forget that he was imprisoned on Talos.

action.name: We're In A Menagerie, A Cage!

crew_archetypes.name: Captain Rudolph Ransom
crew_archetypes.flavor: An exobiologist who was promoted to captain of a science ship after making first contact with the supposedly extinct Yridians.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (Spiegeluniversum)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Als Captain der ISS Enterprise des Terranischen Imperiums benutzt Kirk das Tantalus-Gerät, um seine Rivalen zu eliminieren.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (Kal-if-fee)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk wird von Spocks Verlobter T'Pring als Champion erwählt und muss gegen seinen Freund bis zum Tod kämpfen.

crew_archetypes.name: Romulaner Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk tarnte sich als Romulaner, um für die Sternenflotte eine Tarnvorrichtung zu stehlen.

crew_archetypes.name: Admiral Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nach Abschluss seiner 5-Jahres-Mission wurde Kirk zum Konteradmiral befördert.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (Rura Penthe)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk wurde des Mordes an Kanzler Gorkon beschuldigt und nach Rura Penthe geschickt, dem Friedhof der Fremden.

action.name: Wie sind die Steinmesser und Bärenfelle?

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk erkennt das Ausmaß des Tribble-Problems und befiehlt, dass alle Tribbles von der Enterprise entfernt werden.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk (besorgt)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ein besorgter Kirk übermittelt Spock Details, um seine Erinnerungen zurückzuerlangen.

crew_archetypes.name: Judoka Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sometimes Captain Kirk uses judo techniques, for example, in self-defense or to get along with someone.

crew_archetypes.name: EV Suit Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: While exploring the distressed Defiant, Kirk gets trapped in interspace. The only thing keeping him alive is his environmental suit.

crew_archetypes.name: Chances Taken Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk is determined to risk his life in order to stop the Doomsday Machine.

action.name: A Chance I'll Have To Take

crew_archetypes.name: Officiant Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kirk was officiating a wedding when the ship went to red alert. The marriage that should have just begun would instead end in tragedy.

action.name: All Captains Have One Happy Privilege - Uniting Two People

crew_archetypes.name: Farragut Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: In an alternate timeline where Kirk was the captain of the USS Farragut, he and Pike save Outpost 4 from Romulan attack - at great cost.

action.name: Quite The Ship You Got Here

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: To become an ensign, you have to love Starfleet. To become a legend, you need to be James Kirk.

action.name: Not The Worst Way To Go

crew_archetypes.name: James T. Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: His sense of duty is strong, but Kirk never loses his sense of wonder and awe for the universe.

action.name: The Only Thing That's Truly Yours Is The Rest Of Humanity

crew_archetypes.name: 21st Century Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Seeing Kirk in 21st century Toronto makes one wonder, could Federation time travelers already be in our time, posing as cosplayers?

crew_archetypes.name: Returning Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: Admiral Kirk returns to take command of the Enterprise to protect the planet from V'Ger.

crew_archetypes.name: Kirk and Butler
crew_archetypes.flavor: It’s always cozy and feels like home if your favorite dog is next to you - even if you’re trapped in the Nexus.

crew_archetypes.name: El Capitan Kirk
crew_archetypes.flavor: As McCoy rightly pointed out, climbing El Capitan is a very reckless and irresponsible activity. Just what Kirk needs.

action.name: Gravity Is Foremost On My Mind

crew_archetypes.name: Perrin
crew_archetypes.flavor: Sarek's last wife. She was devoted to him and loved him, and did not doubt his love. She did her best to protect him during his illness.

action.name: I Know. I Have Always Known.

crew_archetypes.name: Uralter Humanoid
crew_archetypes.flavor: Eine der ältesten empfindungsfähigen Spezies und möglicherweise die erste humanoide Spezies, die sich auf einem uralten Planeten in der Milchstraße entwickelt hat.

action.name: Wenn ihr mich sehen und hören könnt, hat sich unsere Hoffnung erfüllt

crew_archetypes.name: Grady
crew_archetypes.flavor: A mentally ill homeless man, he was convinced that aliens were visiting the Earth and that he could be invisible.

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kor
crew_archetypes.flavor: Kor, Sohn von Rynar, kommandierte die Invasionstruppen auf Organia. Sein Konflikt mit Kirk half bei der Aushandlung des Friedensabkommens.

crew_archetypes.name: Tristan Adams
crew_archetypes.flavor: A revolutionary psychologist, credited with humanizing prisons, but was actually a villain who performed cruel experiments on patients.

action.name: The Pain Increases Unless You Obey Me

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Kelby
crew_archetypes.flavor: Commander Kelby übernahm für kurze den Posten des Chefingenieurs an Bord der NX-01 Enterprise.

action.name: Ich kann Dinge mit Klebeband reparieren
Der Körper ist bloß eine Maschine

crew_archetypes.name: Jett Reno (nervös)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Vernebelt durch Zukunftsvisionen versucht ein nervöser Jett Reno, den Zeitkristall so schnell wie möglich zu liefern.

crew_archetypes.name: Temporarily Detained Jett Reno
crew_archetypes.flavor: Bored while she’s trapped on Book’s ship, Reno plays with her food and uses some black licorice to power a communicator to call for help.

action.name: I Have Something That Can Help

crew_archetypes.name: Motura
crew_archetypes.flavor: A Vidiian sculptor suffering from the Phage who needed a lung transplant to save his life.

action.name: There Is No Other Way For Us To Survive

crew_archetypes.name: Alandra La Forge
crew_archetypes.flavor: The spitting image of her father, Alandra follows in his footsteps, joining Starfleet and helping to maintain the Fleet Museum.

crew_archetypes.name: Captain John Harriman
crew_archetypes.flavor: Harrimans erste Mission als Captain der Enterpise B war es, die Flüchtlingsschiffe der El-Aurianer vor dem Nexus zu retten.

action.name: Wir haben soeben das praktisch Unmögliche erreicht

crew_archetypes.name: Remy
crew_archetypes.flavor: While in command of the Serene Squall, Remy and his crew were able to capture Pike and the others, though not for long.

crew_archetypes.name: Ensign Rollins
crew_archetypes.flavor: Ensign Rollins was a tactical officer, but took command of the bridge when Voyager was flung into the Delta Quadrant.

crew_archetypes.name: Carl, Hüter der Ewigkeit
crew_archetypes.flavor: Carl ist eine neue visuelle Repräsentation des Hüters der Ewigkeit und bewacht ein Zeitportal ins 32. Jahrhundert.

action.name: Es gibt mehr als nur einen Weg, um zu sterben

crew_archetypes.name: Borg Queen Jurati
crew_archetypes.flavor: Having achieved harmony with the Borg Queen's consciousness, Jurati has forged a new and more humane collective aimed at saving lives.

crew_archetypes.name: Devious Duet Jurati
crew_archetypes.flavor: In a covert mission to restore the timeline, Jurati takes center stage during a gala, but in her performance it becomes apparent that the Borg Queen has taken over.

crew_archetypes.name: Teenager Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nog ist der Sohn von Rom und Prinadora und arbeitete als Servicekraft in der Bar seines Onkels Quark auf Deep Space Nine.

crew_archetypes.name: Kadett Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Nog war das erste Ferengi-Mitglied der Sternenflotte und wurde als Teil seiner Kadettenausbildung auf DS9 stationiert.

crew_archetypes.name: Belagerer Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: Während der Belagerung von AR-558 leistete Nog als Späher gute Dienste und nutzte sein hervorragendes Ferengi-Gehör, um eine große Kolonne anrückender Jem'Hadar zu entdecken.

action.name: Sie können auf mich zählen, Sir

crew_archetypes.name: Bluffing Nog
crew_archetypes.flavor: When Nog and Quark end up in 1947 as a result of sabotage, Nog decides to bluff to save both himself and his uncle.

action.name: You Want The Truth, I'll Tell You The Truth

crew_archetypes.name: Commander Chekov
crew_archetypes.flavor: Um die Dilithiumkristalle der HMS Bounty zu rekristallisieren, sammelte Chekov Gammastrahlen des Flugzeugträgers USS Enterprise.

action.name: Wenn Schuh passt, dann trag ihn!

crew_archetypes.name: Chekov (Platonier)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chekov wurde zur Unterhaltung der Platonier hergebracht und bereitete sich mit einem Kironide-Cocktail vor, um sich besser verteidigen zu können.

crew_archetypes.name: Chekov (Tribble)
crew_archetypes.flavor: Chekov begleitet Uhura in die Bar von Deep Space K-7, wo sie zum ersten Mal Tribbles sehen.

crew_archetypes.name: Three of Five
